loans.name: Ephantus

texts.en:
Ephantus is married and has three children aged four to 13. He has been pushing carts for 25 years. Ephantus intends to use this loan to add more push carts. 

Ephantus hopes to use the profits from his business to pay for his children's education. In the future, he hopes to get into the Matatu (mini-bus) business. Ephantus describes himself as reliable and humble.

loans.use: to buy more push carts.

loans.name: Margaret

texts.en:
Margaret lives in Uganda. She is married and has six children, all of whom are in school. Margaret has had a restaurant for five years, and she works seven days out of every week.

Margaret has requested a loan of 400,000 Ugandan Shillings from MCDT SACCO, which she will use to buy more bunches of bananas, rice, beef, and charcoal. The main business challenges for Margaret include seasonality and the ever-increasing price of food in Uganda. 

Her goals and aspirations for her business are to own a fully-stocked restaurant. Margaret lives in a home that she owns; she has access to electricity but doesn't have access to piped water. Her major monthly expenses include electricity bills and feeding the family.

loans.use: to buy more bunches of bananas, rice, beef and charcoal

loans.name: Stephen

texts.en:
Stephen is 39 years old, married, and has a six-year-old child. He sells charcoal to local residents in the middle of the Makadara estate. He has been doing this for the last 15 years. Stephen intends to use this loan to buy more charcoal so that he can cater to the growing demands of the economy. 

Stephen hopes to use the profits from his business to pay for his child's education. In the future, he hopes to venture into the business of selling kerosene.

loans.use: to buy more charcoal so that he can cater to the growing demands of the economy

loans.name: Sauda

texts.en:
Sauda is a married woman with one child who attends school. She owns a house that has electricity but not piped water. Her greatest monthly expense is food for the family. 

For the past five years, she has operated a charcoal selling business, she sells at retail and from home to her neighbours and passersby. She faces a major challenge of the high cost of transporting charcoal in her business. She dreams of expanding and establishing a boutique in the future. 

With the 60,000 Kenyan shillings (KES) she wants to purchase sacks of charcoal and bundles of clothes for sale. She decided to join Yehu to access loans to boost her business.

loans.use: To purchase sacks of charcoal and bundles of clothes for sale.

loans.name: Turimbere Group

texts.fr:
Maneno est une commerçante âgée de 40ans qui habite au Quartier Gatumba en Mairie de Bujumbura. Elle  fait le commerce de souliers  depuis 10ans. C’est un métier qu’elle commence apres le commerce de poissons secs appelés « ndagala ». Elle est mariée a Jean et ont ensemble2 enfants qui étudient. Elle prend en charge 3 autres enfants orphelins sans aucune relation parentale avec elle. Elle a fait ses études jusqu’en 8e année du secondaire.

 Son crédit de 500,000francs burundais va contribuer à augmenter son capital pour lui permettre d’acheter beaucoup de souliers à revendre afin de réaliser de grands bénéfices. 

Elle est membre  du groupe  solidaire« TURIMBERE».
texts.en: Maneno is a merchant who is 40 years old and living in the Gatumba District in the capital, Bujumbura. She has been in the shoe business for ten years. This is a trade she started following her ndagala (dried fish) business. Maneno is married to Jean, and they have two children who are in school. She supports three other children, orphans who are unrelated to her. She has an eighth grade education. Her loan of 500,000 Burundi francs is going to help increase her capital and enable her to buy many shoes to sell, so as to make large profits. She is a member of the solidarity group "TURIMBERE".

loans.use: to increase her capital to enable her to purchase many shoes to sell, so as to make large profits

loans.name: Washingstone

texts.en:
Washingtone has been selling second-hand shoes for the last 13 years. He is a hard-working and self-disciplined businessman. He supplements his income from his business and from his salary. He is married and blessed with six children aged 18, 16, 10, six, four, and two. 

In the next five years, he wants to become an established businessman so that he is able to provide a better standard of living for his family. He is grateful to Faulu Kenya for empowering him financially. He wants 50,000 Kenyan shillings to buy more shoes.

loans.use: To buy more shoes

loans.name: Paul

texts.en:
Paul is 32 years old and married. He sells snacks and cakes in a residential area and has two employees. He often sells his goods to individuals and shopkeepers in the area. Paul has been doing this for three years. Paul intends to use this loan to buy a bicycle so that he can deliver the cake that he sells. He also wants to use the loan to by an oven and baking flour for making cakes. 

This is Paul's third loan with SMEP. He is a good client that pays back his loans on time. Paul wants to own a large-scale bakery one day. He describes himself as hardworking, honest, committed, and aggressive when it comes to business.

loans.use: to purchase a bicycle, oven and baking flour

loans.name: Uwazi Na Ukweli Group

texts.en:
Husna, who is in her late 30s, is married with three children, two of whom go to school. She has been running a general store for eight years now. She works from 7:00 AM to 8:00 PM daily and is able to make a small monthly profit. 

This will be her first loan from Tujijenge Tanzania, which she wants to use to increase her store's inventory. Her dream is to one day build a third house. 

She will share this loan with her loan group "Uwazi na Ukweli" which has a total of 26 members, who will hold each other accountable in paying back their loans.

loans.use: to increase her general store's inventory.

loans.name: Maria Auxiliadora Group

texts.es:
El comité se formo a iniciativa de la Sra Evangelista domiciliada en la Ciudad de Carapeguá. el comité fue denominado “MARIA AUXILIADORA” y actualmente se encuentra en el primer ciclo con 12 integrantes. Es un grupo de señoras muy responsables y trabajadoras, ellas se dedican a la producción de alimentos para su posterior venta.
Cada miembro tiene una actividad especifica dentro de la producción de los alimentos. Todas ellas trabajan de forma responsable y solidaria, donde la ayuda entre ellas es lo más loable. Cada una trabaja para procurarse una vida digna, no solo para ellas sino también para su familia.
La Sra. Regina trabaja en la producción de alimentos hace ya varios años, y todas ellas ya tienen una clientela formada. Solicitan el credito para la compra de los insumos necesarios para que produzcan los alimentos, como ser las carnes, pollo, huevos y demás. Todas ellas están con las esperanzas puestas en el crédito.
texts.en: This group was formed thanks to the work of Evangelista, who lives in the city of Carapeguá, Paraguay. The group is called "Maria Auxiliadora", has 12 members and is in its first loan cycle. This group consists of very responsible and hard-working women who make a living producing food to later sell. Every member has a specific job related to food production. The women work together responsibly and with solidarity, and they consider helping each other out to be very commendable. Each one works for a dignified life, not only for themselves but also for their families. One of the members is Regina, who has made food to sell for a number of years and already has a solid customer base. The women are requesting the loan to purchase the necessary ingredients to make their meals, such as meat, chicken, eggs and other items. All of them have their hopes resting on the loan.

loans.use: to purchase necessary ingredients, such as meat, chicken, eggs and others, to make meals to sell.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to purchase more stock for his retail food shop.

loans.name: Be Honest Ii Group

texts.en:
In the photo are members of the “Be Honest II” group. They are small-scale businesspeople based in Waterloo, a town near Freetown. This is the first loan these entrepreneurs are accessing from SMT/Kiva lenders. With this loan, they will be able to expand their businesses, make more profit and consequently improve their standard of living. 

The leader of this group is Mohamed. Mohamed is age 55; he was born in the northern town of Lunsar. Currently, he is residing in Waterloo together with his wife and nine children. His wife is a businesswoman and two of his children are attending primary school. For many years now, Mohamed has been a businessman. He sells used clothes. With his share of this loan, he is going to buy a bale of used clothes to add to his business inventory.

loans.use: to buy a bale of used clothes to add to his business inventory.

loans.name: Saldivar Poty Group

texts.es:
El Comité de Mujeres, Saldivar Poty, se conformo gracias a que la actual Directora General. la Sra.Maria, quien se dedica a la elaboracion y venta de artículos de limpieza, contactó con la asesora en una reunión semanal que la misma tenía en la zona, para enterarse de la forma de trabajo que tiene el Comité de Mujeres Emprendedoras,una vez asesorada acerca del Programa logró juntar a 17 mujeres quienes se encuentran trabajando muy a gusto ya en el 13º ciclo, en forma conjunta y solidaria dentro del programa.
Ellas se consideran mujeres emprendedoras, que luchan por brindarle a sus familias un techo y una vida digna y decorosa.
La Sra. Maria se dedica a la elaboración de productos de limpieza desde hace ya varios años. Ella misma se encarga de la elaboración de sus productos y luego de venderlos. Posee un pequeño puesto, el cual algún día le gustaría ampliar.
Ella solicita el credito para la compra de los materiales para la elaboración de los productos de limpieza, tales como jabones, esencias, colorantes y demás.
texts.en: The Saldivar Poty group was formed thanks to current general director Maria, who makes a living making and selling cleaning supplies. She contacted an adviser at a weekly meeting in the area about working with the Women's Entrepreneur Committee. Once she learned more about the program she was able to bring together 17 women who are now passionately working jointly and with solidarity on their 13th loan cycle with the program. They consider themselves to be enterprising women who fight to provide their families with a dignified and decent life. Maria has made a living making cleaning supplies for a number of years. She is in charge of the production and then later sells the products. She has a small sales post that she would like to expand some day. She is requesting the loan to purchase materials like soaps, scents, colorings and other items to make her cleaning products.

loans.use: To purchase materials, such as soaps, scents, colorings and other items,  to make cleaning products.

loans.name: Hasan

texts.ru: Хасан проживает в районе Яван. Возраст, 48 лет. Женат. Имеет троих детей. Жена, домохозяйка. Сам он занимается растениеводством. Он при доме имеет большой участок земли, где выращивает овощи. Этим видом деятельности Хасан занимается уже 15 лет. Целью получения кредита является закуп семян и минеральных удобрений для посева кукурузы и овощей.
texts.en: Hasan lives in Yavan. He is 48 years old, married, and has three children. His wife is a housewife. He is a farmer.  At home he has a large plot of land where he grows vegetables. Hasan has been doing this for fifteen years.  He is taking out a loan to buy seed and mineral fertilizer for his corn and vegetable crops.

loans.use: to buy seed and mineral fertilizer for his corn and vegetable crops.

loans.name: Paul

texts.en:
Paul is married and has two children aged 2 and 9. He is a mechanic and services vehicles in the Karen area. Paul has been running this business for eight years. He intends to use this loan to buy more spare parts. 

Paul hopes to one day own a big "Duka" (shop) where customers can get any spare part they require. Paul describes himself as humble and hard-working.

loans.use: to buy more spare parts used to repair vehicles.

loans.name: Jitegemee Group

texts.en:
Dorotea, who is in her early 50s, is married with four children.  The youngest is in college. She has been running a doughnut business for 30 years now. She works from 6am to 9pm daily and is able to make a small monthly profit.

This will be her 6th "motisha" loan from Tujijenge Tanzania.  A Motisha loan is a product offered by Tujijenge Tanzania that allows borrowers with good credit ratings to pay back their original loans faster and receive extra money before their original loan term has ended. She used the previous loans to pay school fees and buy few kilos of baking flour for her business and for household expenses.  She has paid back all her loans successfully. She hopes for a loan to buy 50 kilos of baking flour, 30 kilos of sugar, a sack of charcoal and a bucket of cooking oil to make more doughnuts.  Her dream is to one day start a chicken business.

She will share this loan with her loan group "Jitegemee" which has a total of 13 members, who will hold each other accountable in paying back their loans.

loans.use: To buy 50 kilos of baking flour, 30 kilos of sugar, a sack of charcoal and a bucket of cooking oil to make more doughnuts.

loans.name: Peguaho Group

texts.es:
El comité se formo en la ciudad de Paraguarí, cuenta actualmente con 18 miembros. Todas ellas son mujeres jefas de familia que trabajan para llevar a sus hogares el sustento diario. Ellas tienen un compromiso de unión y trabajan en un marco de respeto, ayuda mutua y trabajo solidario.
La Sra. Rocio se dedica a la cría de cerdo desde hace ya varios años. Tiene una cantidad determinada de animales, pero sueña un día con tener una granja donde poder albergar a mas animales. Todo el esfuerzo que ella realiza es para darle a sus hijos un mejor porvenir y de esa manera evitar que ellos pasen por los mismos sacrificios que ella.
Ella solicita el credito para la compra de cerdos, como así también para la compra de alimentos para los mismos. Piensa que de obtener el credito, este le sera de mucha ayuda para el logro de sus metas.
texts.en:
This credit committee started in the city of Paraguarí, and currently has 18 members. All the members are women head of households and work every day to support their families. They have pledged solidarity within the group, by working together respectfully and supporting one other.

Rocio has been raising pigs for several years. She can only handle a certain number of animals, but one day she dreams of having a farm so she can accommodate more animals. She works hard in order to provide her children with a better future, so that they will not have to make the same sacrifices as she does.

She is requesting a loan to buy more pigs, as well as nutrient-enriched feed. This loan will greatly help her in achieving her goals.

loans.use: Purchase of pigs and animal feed.

loans.name: Marceline

texts.en:
Marceline is 44 years old and married. She sells bricks. Her business is well organized and she has three years' experience. She currently employs four people to help her. The hours of her business are from 7 am to 5 pm every day except Sunday.  

Marceline has requested a loan from Kiva lenders in order to purchase more bricks to sell. Marceline will reinvest the profit in her business and save money for her family.

loans.use: to fabricate more bricks to sell.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: To purchase bundles of wheat flour, rice and potatoes.

loans.name: Ali

texts.en:
This borrower is from Iraq. He is 27 years old, married and has two children.

Ali has owned a factory since 2009, where he manufactures blocks. He has good experience and a good reputation and he is well known in his area.

He is requesting $1200 loan to buy a block-pressing machine. He is aiming to gain more profits so he can improve his family’s quality of life.

loans.use: To buy a block-pressing machine.

loans.name: Medalla Milagrosa Group

texts.es:
El comité se formo gracias a la Sra. Maria, ella había oído hablar del grupo de mujeres emprendedoras y quedo fascinada con la idea, por lo que organizo a sus vecinas y amigas, las cuales encantadas aceptaron conformar el Comité al que llamaron Medalla Milagrosa.
el comité actualmente tiene 10 miembros, todas ellas se definen como mujeres trabajadoras y responsable. Todas ellas luchan por un mejor porvenir para ellas y sus familiares, se unieron con ese propósito y desean cumplirlo.
La Sra. Maria se dedica a la venta de comidas rápidas, como ser sandwishs, empanadas, croquetas, y demás. Cada día a muy tempranas horas se levanta a preparar los alimentos que va a vender. Ella manifiesta que todo sacrificio es pequeño por lograr un bienestar a su familia.
Ella solicita el credito para la compra de los ingredientes para los alimentos que prepara como ser las especias, carnes, hortalizas y demás.
texts.en:
The group was formed thanks to Mrs. Maria who had heard of a group of entrepreneurial woman and was fascinated by the idea. So she organized her friends and neighbors who were delighted to agree to make up the Committee that they named Medalla Milagrosa [Miraculous Medal]. The committee currently has ten members, all of whom define themselves as hardworking and responsible women. They all fight for a better future for themselves and their families. They came together with that purpose and want to fulfill it. 

Mrs. Maria works selling fast food such as sandwiches, empanadas, croquettes and other foods. Every day at a very early hour she gets up to prepare the foods she is going to sell. She asserts that every sacrifice is a small one when it comes to achieving wellbeing for her family. 

She is seeking the loan to purchase ingredients for the foods she prepares, such as spices, meat, garden produce and other ingredients.

loans.use: to purchase cooking ingredients such as spices, meat, produce and other items.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: To add more inventory and renovate his shop.

loans.name: Serah

texts.en:
Serah is 28 years old and a hard-working and determined business lady. She is married and she is a proud mother of two children aged 8 and 11. She currently owns rental houses to earn a living. This income is supplemented by the income she gets from her van transport business. She was previously engaged in a building and construction business. 

She wants to expand her business in the next five years and to ensure that it gives her consistent and ample income to support her family.  Through Faulu Kenya she has been able to acquire business management skills.  She wants 40,000 Kenyan shillings to buy cement, sand and building stones to construct more houses.

loans.use: To buy cement, sand and building stones.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: To purchase bundles of vegetables, tomatoes, potatoes and onions.

loans.name: Akil

texts.en:
This borrower is from Iraq. He is 34 years old and single.

Akil has had a store for electrical equipment since 1995. He has good experience and a good reputation and he is well-known in his area.


He is requesting a $2400 loan to make a sliding door and to add more inventory. He is aiming to earn more profits so he can improve his family’s quality of life.

loans.use: To make a sliding door and to add more inventory.

loans.name: Hugo Vinicio

texts.es:
Hugo Vinicio tiene 37 años, es casado vive con la esposa y con los hijos en  el Cantón Guaranda Provincia de Bolívar. Tiene 7 hijos.

Los miembros de la V.R.C.  SAGRADO CORAZON  se encuentra ubicada en el sector Cuatro Esquinas perteneciente al cantón Guaranda a una distancia de 15 minutos de la oficina de la cooperativa, esta ventanilla integran 12 socios que se dedican a la agricultura, crianza de animales y a la comercialización de los mismos y otras actividades que da utilidades.

Hugo se dedica a la agricultura siembra papas, trigo, maíz en tierras propias donde tiene dos cuadras de terreno, también tiene otra actividad un negocio donde presta servicios de funeraria. Las compras las realiza en el mercado de Guaranda y las vende en el mercado mayorista de la misma ciudad.

Solicita el crédito para la comprar de insumos para los cultivos. Con el apoyo del crédito le ayudaría económicamente para suplir sus necesidades. Su sueño es tener un negocio estable para mejorar la situacion economica.

Le gusta las fiestas de San Pedro y Carnaval ademas le gusta hacer deporte.
texts.en:
Hugo Vinicio is 37 years old, married and lives with his wife and children in the hamlet Guaranda in the province of Bolívar. He has seven children. 

The members of the communal bank "Sagrado Corazón" [Sacred Heart] are located in the Cuatro Esquinas area belonging to the Guaranda hamlet, fifteen minutes away from the cooperative's office. This group is made up of 12 members who raise crops and livestock in commercial enterprises, as well as other income-producing activities. 

Hugo earns a living in farming. He grows potatoes, wheat and corn on his own land where he has two blocks [about 3 acres] of land. He also has another business of providing funeral services. He does his purchasing in the Guaranda market and his selling in the wholesale market of the same city. 

He is seeking the loan to purchase supplies for his farming. With the support of the loan he would be financially helped to supply his needs. His dream is to have a stable business to improve his financial situation. He likes the San Pedro and Carnaval holidays as well as playing sports.

loans.use: to purchase supplies for growing crops.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: To buy charts.

loans.name: Kalim

texts.en: Kalim is 48 years old, married and blessed with three children who range in age from 22 to 27. For the last 10 years, she has made a living selling electrical supplies and earns about KES 15,000 a month, all of which she uses to support her family. She is applying for her second loan from KADET after repaying her first one off successfully. She will use this loan to expand her business and buy more electrical bulbs, switches and cable to sell to her customers. Her long-term goals are to open a wholesale electric supply center and buy her own business vehicle. She believes that doing this will allow her to improve her family's living standards.

loans.use: to buy electrical bulbs, switches and cables to sell to her customers.

loans.name: Begmurot

texts.ru: Бегмурот проживает в районе Джиликул. Ему 45 лет. Он женат. У него четверо детей. Его жена работает в колхозе. Сам Бегмурот зарабатывает путем разведения крупнорогатого скота. Он разводит скот у себя дома. Этим видом деятельности он занимается 25 лет. Кроме того в свободное время он занимается строительными работами по найму. Крдит берет для закупа дойной коровы.
texts.en: Begmurot lives in Jilikul. He is 45 years old, married, and has four children. His wife works on a collective farm. Begmurot earns a living by breeding cattle. He raises cattle at home. He has been doing this work for 25 years. In his spare time he does construction work as a day laborer.  He is taking out a loan to buy a milk cow.

loans.use: to buy a milk cow

loans.name: Thamer

texts.en:
This borrower is from Iraq. He is 29 years old, married and has three children.

Thamer has owned a farm for rearing calves and cows since 2000. He has a long experience in this field and has a deep understanding of local consumer needs and he is well known in his area.

He is requesting an $1800 loan to make an external fence. He is aiming to earn more profits to improve his family’s quality of life.

loans.use: To make an external fence for his farm.

loans.name: Carlos Guillermo

texts.es:
Carlos Guillermo tiene 36 años, es casado vive con la esposa y con los hijos en  el Cantón Guaranda Provincia de Bolívar. Tiene 7 hijos.

Los miembros de la V.R.C.  SAGRADO CORAZON  se encuentra ubicada en el sector Cuatro Esquinas perteneciente al cantón Guaranda a una distancia de 15 minutos de la oficina de la cooperativa, esta ventanilla integran 12 socios que se dedican a la agricultura, crianza de animales y a la comercialización de los mismos y otras actividades que da utilidades.

Carlos se dedica a la agricultura siembra papas, trigo, maíz en tierras propias, ademas tiene 4 cabezas de ganado. Las compras las realiza en el mercado de Guaranda y las vende en el mercado mayorista de la misma ciudad.

Solicita el crédito para la comprar de insumos para los cultivos y alimento para los animales. Con el apoyo del crédito le ayudaría económicamente para suplir sus necesidades. Enfrenta desafios como es la Fiebre Aftosa en el ganado. Su sueño es comprar una casa en el sector donde vive.

Le gusta hacer deporte y festejar las fiestas de navidad, fin de año, carnaval y San pedro.
texts.en:
Carlos Guillermo is 36 years old, married and lives with his wife and children in the hamlet of Guaranda in the provide of Bolívar. He has seven children. 

The members of the communal bank "Sagrado Corazón" [Sacred Heart] are located in the Cuatro Esquinas area belonging to the Guaranda hamlet, fifteen minutes away from the cooperative's office. This group is made up of 12 members who raise crops and livestock in commercial enterprises, as well as other income-producing activities.

Carlos earns a living in farming. He grows potatoes, wheat and corn on his own land. He also has four head of cattle. He does his purchasing in the Guaranda market and his selling in the wholesale market of the same city. He is seeking the loan to purchase supplies for growing his crops and feed for his animals. With the support of the loan he would be financially helped to supply his needs. He faces challenges such as foot and mouth disease in his cattle. His dream is to buy a house in the area where he lives. 

He likes to play sports and celebrate the Christmas and New Year's holidays, as well as Carnaval and San Pedro's Day.

loans.use: to purchase supplies for growing crops and feed for his animals.

loans.name: Manuel Antonio

texts.en:
Manuel is 33 years old and lives in the city of Cotacachi in northern Ecuador. He is married and lives with his wife and their five children aged twelve, ten, seven, six, and two years, respectively. Manuel describes himself as hardworking, humble, and simple. He works with his wife and her cousins at his business making cement blocks. 

Manuel reports that the business is going well and that they are currently selling 4,000 cement blocks a month. He is seeking his first loan to buy a machine to make blocks more efficiently and easily. He hopes that the loan will improve his quality of life and give them the ability to produce more cement blocks. In the future, he would like to have a larger store to sell the cement blocks and own a hardware store.

loans.use: to buy a machine that helps him make cement blocks.

loans.name: Mary

texts.en:
Mary is 52 years old, hard-working, ambitious and innovative. She is married and blessed with five children aged; 25, 19, 18, 18 and 15 years. She currently sells tea leaves, ginger and coffee. Prior to this, she used to sell clothes. She is grateful to Faulu Kenya for helping her to grow her business.

In the next five years, she wants to expand her business and become financially stable. She has requested 40,000 Kenyan shillings to buy tea leaves, ginger and coffee.

loans.use: To buy ginger, tea leaves and coffee.

loans.name: Angel Segundo

texts.es:
Angel Segundo tiene 50 años, es casado vive con la esposa y con los hijos en  el Cantón Guaranda Provincia de Bolívar. Tiene 5 hijos.

Los miembros de la V.R.C.  SAGRADO CORAZON  se encuentra ubicada en el sector Cuatro Esquinas perteneciente al cantón Guaranda a una distancia de 15 minutos de la oficina de la cooperativa, esta ventanilla integran 12 socios que se dedican a la agricultura, crianza de animales y a la comercialización de los mismos y otras actividades que da utilidades.

Angel se dedica a la agricultura siembra papas, trigo, maíz ademas tiene chanchos y dos cabezas de ganado vacuno. Las compras las realiza en el mercado de Guaranda y las vende en el mercado mayorista de la misma ciudad.

Solicita el crédito para la comprar de insumos para los cultivos y alimento para los animales. Con el apoyo del crédito le ayudaría económicamente para suplir sus necesidades. enfrenta desafios como enfermedades en los animales. Su sueño es comprar mas terreno para seguir sembrando.

Le gusta pasar y visitar a la familia.
texts.en:
Angel Segundo is 50 years old, married, and lives with his wife and children in the canton of Guaranda in Bolívar Province. He has five children.

The members of the Sacred Heart Communal Bank meet in the sector of Cuatro Esquinas, which is part of the canton of Guaranda and located 15 minutes from the office of Cooperativa San Jose. The Communal Bank consists of 12 members who engage in agriculture, livestock breeding, the sale of their products, and other profitable activities.

Angel is a farmer who grows potatoes, wheat, and corn. He also has pigs and two heads of cattle. Angel purchases his supplies at the market in Guaranda and sells his products at the wholesale market in the same city.

He is requesting a loan to buy supplies for his crops and feed for his animals. With the financial assistance provided through this loan, he will be able to acquire needed supplies. The challenges he faces include diseases that could impact his animals. His dream is to have more land so that he can continue planting.

Angel enjoys visiting with his family and spending time with them.

loans.use: to purchase farming supplies and feed for his animals.

loans.name: San Blas Group

texts.es:
El comité San Blas es de la ciudad de Asunción, actualmente cuenta con 18 miembros, todas ellas trabajan en un ambiente de cooperación y trabajo responsable. Todas trabajan para ofrecerle lo mejor a sus hijos y familiares.
La Sra. Olga se dedica a la elaboración de comestibles artesanales como ser empanadas, milanesas, y demás tipos de minutas. Por medio de este trabajo ella ha otorgado el sustento diario a su familia, dándoles una vida digna y decorosa. Sueña con algún día poder agrandar su establecimiento de comidas, y con eso generar más ingresos.
Ella solicita el crédito para la compra de carnes, especias, jamón, queso, y demás ingredientes que necesitaría para la elaboración de los alimentos. Sabe que este crédito le será de gran ayuda para poder continuar con sus negocios, ya que abasteciéndose puede garantizar a sus clientes sus productos.
texts.en:
The San Blas Committee is from the city of Asunción and currently has 18 members.  All of them work responsibly and in a spirit of cooperation so that they can provide the best for their children and families.  

Sra. Olga prepares homemade food such as empanadas, breaded meats, and other types of short-order dishes.  Through her work, she has been able to provide for the daily needs of her family so that they can live a decent and dignified life.  Olga dreams some day of expanding her food establishment so that she can generate more income.

She is requesting a loan to buy meats, spices, ham, cheese, and other ingredients that are needed for preparing her dishes.  Olga knows that this loan will be a great help in continuing her business.  Being fully stocked will guarantee that she can provide food to her customers.

loans.use: to purchase meats, spices, ham, cheese, and other ingredients.

loans.name: Via Ferrea Group

texts.es:
Las mujeres de este comité son de la ciudad de Caacupé, el mismo se formo de un grupo de vecinas y amigas de la zona. Actualmente el comité cuenta con 12 miembros, en el cual todas trabajan de forma responsable y organizadas. Se organizaron con el fin de promover el bien común entre todas las miembros.
La Sra. Myrna es tejedora de ñanduti (tejido hecho a mano para ropas, u ornamentos). Desde pequeña realiza este arte, ya que su madre se lo había trasmitido. Por medio de este trabajo ella ha logrado mantener a su familia y sus hijos. Ella sueña con algún día poder agrandar su negocio para poder seguir cómodamente con su trabajo.
Ella solicita el credito para la compra de los materiales necesarios para continuar con su trabajo, estos materiales consistirían en hilos de todas clases y colores, y ademas de eso todos los tipos de agujas que llegaría a necesitar. La Sra. Myrna tiene mucha fe en el credito y que le sera de gran ayuda.
texts.en:
The women of this committee are from the city of Caacupé. This group consists of neighbors and friends from the area. There are currently 12 members in the group, all of whom work responsibly and in an organized manner. This group has joined together to promote the common good among all its members.

Sra. Myrna produces “ñanduti” (a handmade lace used in clothing and decorations). She learned this craft at a young age from her mother. Through her work, Myrna has been able to support her family and her children. Her dream someday is to expand her business so that she can continue to work comfortably.

She is requesting a loan to buy the necessary materials to continue her business. These materials consist of different types of thread in various colors and different types of needles. Sra. Myrna has plenty of faith that this loan will be of great help.

loans.use: to purchase thread and needles.

loans.name: Segundo

texts.es:
Segundo tiene 45 años, es casado vive con la esposa y con los hijos en  el Cantón Guaranda Provincia de Bolívar. Tiene 2 hijos.

Los miembros de la V.R.C.  SAGRADO CORAZON  se encuentra ubicada en el sector Cuatro Esquinas perteneciente al cantón Guaranda a una distancia de 15 minutos de la oficina de la cooperativa, esta ventanilla integran 12 socios que se dedican a la agricultura, crianza de animales y a la comercialización de los mismos y otras actividades que da utilidades.

Segundo se dedica a la agricultura siembra papas, trigo, maíz ademas tiene tres cabezas de ganado y como trabajo extra se dedica a la albañeria. Las compras las realiza en el mercado de Guaranda y las vende en el mercado mayorista de la misma ciudad.

Solicita el crédito para la comprar de insumos para los cultivos y alimento para los animales. Con el apoyo del crédito le ayudaría económicamente para suplir sus necesidades. enfrenta desafios como enfermedades en los animales. Su sueño es tener mas terreno para dedicarse solo a esta actividad que es la que le gusta.

Le gusta bailar en las fiesta de carnaval y San Pedro.
texts.en:
Segundo is 45 years old, married, and lives with his wife and children in the canton of Guaranda in Bolívar Province. He has two children.

The members of the Sacred Heart Communal Bank meet in the sector of Cuatro Esquinas, which is part of the canton of Guaranda and located 15 minutes from the office of Cooperativa San Jose. The Communal Bank consists of 12 members who engage in agriculture, livestock breeding, the sale of their products, and other profitable activities.

Segundo is a farmer who grows potatoes, wheat, and corn. He also has three heads of cattle and works an additional job as a mason. Segundo purchases his supplies at the market in Guaranda and sells his products at the wholesale market in the same city.

He is requesting a loan to buy supplies for his crops and feed for his animals. With the financial assistance provided through this loan, he will be able to acquire needed supplies. The challenges he faces include diseases that could impact his animals. His dream is to have more land so that he can dedicate himself exclusively to farming, the activity that he enjoys.

Segundo enjoys dancing at the Carnival celebrations and at the San Pedro festival.

loans.use: to purchase farming supplies and animal feed.

loans.name: Jacinta

texts.en:
Jacinta has been selling ladies' clothes for the last three years. She is a 24-year-old hard-working businesswoman.  She is a single mother of a six-year-old. 

In the next five years, she hopes to open another business in the town centre.  She is grateful to Faulu Kenya for empowering her financially. She hopes that one day, she will be financially stable.  She wants a 50,000 Kenyan shilling loan to buy more clothes.

loans.use: To buy clothes.

loans.name: Rafaela

texts.es:
La socia pertenece al banco “CRISTO ASENCION DE RUMICHACA”; el Banco Comunal se encuentra ubicado en el distrito de Urubamba, Provincia de Urubamba y departamento de Cusco.

La socia es la Sra. Rafaela; la socia tiene 54 años de edad y es casada, la socia tiene 3 hijos de 38,37,12 años de edad; la socia se dedica a la elaboración de chicha y ella tiene en su propia casa un espacio destinado a la venta de la tradicional chicha de jora elaborado a base de maíz amarillo macerado, la socia también tiene un terreno de cultivo en el cual siembra verduras, y las lleva a vender los días domingos en el mercado de Urubamba, la socia desea el crédito para invertir en la compra de maíz amarillo y semillas de diferentes tipos de verduras. La socia solicita el préstamo para comprar maíz amarillo para la elaboración de chicha y semillas de verduras.

La socia agradece el préstamo que se le otorgara y se compromete en cumplir con los pagos de sus cuotas de manera disciplinada.
texts.en:
Sra. Rafaela is a member of the Communal Bank “Cristo Asencion de Rumichaca”. This Communal Bank is located in the District and Province of Urubamba, Department of Cusco.

She is 54 years old, married, and has three children (ages 38, 37, and 12). Rafaela prepares “chicha” (a traditional Peruvian beverage). She has a space in her own home that is set aside for selling traditional “chicha de jora”, which is made from ground yellow corn. Rafaela also has her own land for growing vegetables, which she brings on Sundays to the market in Urubamba to sell. She is seeking a loan to invest in the purchase of yellow corn and different types of vegetable seeds. Therefore, she is requesting a loan in order to buy these items.

Rafaela is grateful for the loan that has been provided and promises to complete her payments in a disciplined manner.

loans.use: to purchase yellow corn for making "chicha" and vegetable seeds.

loans.name: Ganyana Womens Group

texts.en:
43-year-old Aisha is married and a mother to six kids. Her business day involves keeping and selling poultry. She has been in this business for five years now and she operates from Kampala. This business is becoming one of the most lucrative businesses, especially in many urban areas in Uganda. The consumption rate of chicken in Ugandan urban areas is rising every day. It’s for that reason that people like Aisha are doing excellent business. 

Aisha says she took over this business from her deceased parents. Weekly she makes sales profits amounting to Ugandan shillings 70,000. She anticipates her business's prospects to get better with the passage of time and with the acquisition of this loan. She says she will use this Kiva loan money to purchase more poultry to resell to her increasing clientele, principally small restaurant owners and bar owners.

loans.use: to purchase more poultry to resell.

loans.name: Kapar

texts.en:
Kapar, a 63-year-old farmer who lives in Sary-Dobo village, is married and has five children. In 1991 Kapar decided to begin his business in animal breeding and land cultivation. A very purposeful and positive person, Kapar has worked hard to support his family. The revenue from these activities allowed him to give a good education to his children.

Now Kapar will use this loan of KGS 100,000 to buy four bull-calves for fattening and reselling. In the future, Kapar plans to enlarge his business and rebuild a barn for cattle.

Bai Tushum and Partners uses Kiva funding to target especially vulnerable people. Bai Tushum and Partners is one of the leading Microfinance Institutions in Kyrgyzstan. As a reliable financial partner, Bai Tushum contributes to the economic development of the Kyrgyz Republic through the delivery of microfinance services in rural and urban areas that lead to increased employment and meet the interests of its clients and investors.

loans.use: to purchase cattle.

loans.name: Hermitania

texts.es:
La socia pertenece al banco “CRISTO ASENCION DE RUMICHACA”; el Banco Comunal se encuentra ubicado en el distrito de Urubamba, Provincia de Urubamba y departamento de Cusco.

La socia es la Sra. Hermitania; la socia tiene 46 años de edad y es casada, la socia tiene 5 hijos de los cuales el mayor es independiente y los otros 4 hijos son de 22, 20, 18, 12 años de edad aun están bajo su cuidado y estudiando la superior y en el colegio;  la socia tiene una pequeña picantería en el barrio tradicional de Urubamba llamado "Pintacha", la socia en su picantería ofrece diferentes platos típicos como trucha al horno con ensalada y papa doradas, rocoto relleno y otros, la socia también vende la famosa bebida de los incas la chicha a base de maíz amarillo, la socia requiere en esta ocasión invertir el préstamo en la compra de maíz amarillo para la elaboración de la chicha y comprar algunos utensilios de cocina que ya requiere el cambio así como ollas, platos y otros. La socia solicita el préstamo para invertir en la compra de maíz amarillo y de algunos utensilios de cocina.

La socia agradece el préstamo que se le otorgara y se compromete en cumplir con los pagos de sus cuotas de manera disciplinada.
texts.en:
Sra. Hermitania is a member of the Communal Bank “Cristo Asencion de Rumichaca”.  This Communal Bank is located in the District and Province of Urubamba, Department of Cusco.

She is 46 years old, married, and has five children, one of whom is grown and independent, and the other four are aged 22, 20, 18, and 12 and are still under her care and studying at school.  Ermitania has a small restaurant in the traditional neighborhood of Pintacha in Urubamba.  She offers traditional dishes such as baked trout with salad and golden potatoes, stuffed bell peppers, and other specialties.  Ermitania also sells the famous drink of the Incas known as “chicha”, which is made from yellow corn.  On this occasion, she is seeking a loan to invest in the purchase of yellow corn for making “chicha” as well as some cooking utensils.  She has pots, dishes, and other items that need to be replaced.  Therefore, she is requesting a loan to invest in the purchase of yellow corn and cooking utensils.    

Ermitania is grateful for the loan that has been provided and promises to complete her payments in a disciplined manner.

loans.use: to purchase yellow corn and cooking utensils.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to purchase farming supplies and animal feed.

loans.name: Gregoria

texts.es:
La socia pertenece al banco “CRISTO ASENCION DE RUMICHACA”; el Banco Comunal se encuentra ubicado en el distrito de Urubamba, Provincia de Urubamba y departamento de Cusco.

La socia es la Sra. Gregoria; la socia tiene 55 años de edad, la socia es casada y tiene 4 hijos varones y una mujer, la socia se encarga de apoyar al último de sus hijos que tiene 17 años de edad, la socia se dedica la compra y venta de artesanía ella elabora textiles, ella misma se encarga de tejer las mantas, guantes, ponchos, chalinas, todos los textiles, pasadizos muñecas de trapo, ente otros, la socia trabaja en la puerta del hotel ecoanden en el valle sagrado, la socia requiere el préstamo para poder invertir en la compra de materiales así como lanas de diferentes texturas como alpaca, oveja, sintética, la socia también desea comprar cierres, hilos, tintes para teñir las lanas, botones y otros materiales. La socia solicita el préstamo para invertir en la compra de materiales para la realización de textiles.

La socia agradece el préstamo que se le otorgara y se compromete en cumplir con los pagos de sus cuotas de manera disciplinada.
texts.en:
Sra. Gregoria is a member of the Communal Bank “Cristo Asencion de Rumichaca”. This Communal Bank is located in the District and Province of Urubamba, Department of Cusco.

She is 55 years old, married, and has four sons and a daughter. Gregoria is in charge of supporting her youngest child, who is 17 years old. She buys and sells handicrafts. Gregoria produces textiles that she uses in making blankets, gloves, ponchos, shawls, all types of fabrics, cloth dolls, and other items. She has a business set up at the doorstep of the Ecoandina Hotel in the Sacred Valley. Gregoria needs a loan to invest in the purchase of materials including different types of wool such as alpaca, sheep, and synthetic. She will also buy zippers, thread, wool dye, buttons, and other items. By requesting this loan, she will be able to acquire the materials for making textiles.

Gregoria is grateful for the loan that has been provided and promises to complete her payments in a disciplined manner.

loans.use: to purchase materials used in producing textiles.

loans.name: Maria Olga

texts.es:
María Olga tiene 24 años, es casada vive con el esposo y con los hijos en  el Cantón Guaranda Provincia de Bolívar. Tiene 3 hijos.

Los miembros de la V.R.C.  SAGRADO CORAZON  se encuentra ubicada en el sector Cuatro Esquinas perteneciente al cantón Guaranda a una distancia de 15 minutos de la oficina de la cooperativa, esta ventanilla integran 12 socios que se dedican a la agricultura, crianza de animales y a la comercialización de los mismos y otras actividades que da utilidades.

Maria se dedica a la agricultura siembra papas, trigo, maíz en terrenos propios, además tiene 1 vaca lechera. Las compras las realiza en el mercado de Guaranda y las vende en el mercado mayorista de la misma ciudad.

Solicita el crédito para la comprar de insumos para los cultivos y alimento para el animal. Con el apoyo del crédito le ayudaría económicamente para suplir sus necesidades. Enfrenta desafíos como enfermedades en los cultivos. Su sueño es comprar un vehiculo.

Le gusta hacer deporte.
texts.en:
María Olga is 24 years old and married. She lives with her husband and children in the canton of Guaranda in Bolívar Province. María has three children.

The members of the Sacred Heart Communal Bank meet in the sector of Cuatro Esquinas, which is part of the canton of Guaranda and located 15 minutes from the office of Cooperativa San Jose. The Communal Bank consists of 12 members who engage in agriculture, livestock breeding, the sale of their products, and other profitable activities.

María is a farmer who grows potatoes, wheat, and corn on her own land. She also has one dairy cow. María purchases her supplies at the market in Guaranda and sells her products at the wholesale market in the same city.

She is requesting a loan to buy supplies for her crops and feed for her cow. With the financial assistance provided through this loan, she will be able to acquire needed supplies. The challenges she faces include diseases that could impact her crops. Her dream is to buy a vehicle.

María enjoys playing sports.

loans.use: to purchase farming supplies and animal feed.

loans.name: Christine

texts.en:
Christine, who lives in Kampala, Uganda, is married and has three children, all of whom are in school. For the past three years Christine has operated a retail shop, and works seven days out of every week. She has requested a loan of 300000 Ugandan Shillings from MCDT SACCO to buy more bags of sugar, cartons of salt and a bag of rice. The main business challenges Christine faces are seasonality and the ever-increasing prices of commodities. Her business goal is to own a wholesale shop.

Christine lives in a home that she owns; she doesn't have access to either electricity or piped water. Her major monthly expenses include school fees and food for the family.

loans.use: to buy more bags of sugar, cartons of salt and a bag of rice.

loans.name: Takalani Group

texts.en:
Tholakele is 47 years old and single with four children between 2 and 17 years old. Three of the children attend school.  Her other source of income is the government’s child support grant. In the photo above, she is standing in the middle of her group with her hand raised.

She’s been in this business for three years and sells skirts, shirts, shoes, trousers, and underwear in Hlabisa, South Africa. She requested this loan through WDB and Kiva to sell more clothing from her home and at pension pay points. 

The main challenge to her business is that customers buy on credit and fail to pay on time. In five years time, she would like to have a formal place for her business. The extra income from this loan will help her extend her house and send her children to school.

She appreciates WDB and KIVA and hopes that they will help others as well.

loans.use: to buy skirts, shirts, shoes, trousers and underwear

loans.name: Fidelia

texts.es:
La socia pertenece al banco “CRISTO ASENCION DE RUMICHACA”; el Banco Comunal se encuentra ubicado en el distrito de Urubamba, Provincia de Urubamba y departamento de Cusco.

La socia es la Sra, Fidelia; la socia tiene 54 años de edad y es soltera la socia tiene 10 hijos de los cuales los de 16 y 14 años de edad están aun bajo su cuidado, la socia se dedica a la  compra y venta de flores en el mercado principal y también aprovecha su terreno de cultivo de maíz y de verduras y la socia siembra y cosecha estos productos y los lleva a vender al mercado en cuanto estos estén listos para ser cosechados; la socia trabaja siempre en todo lo que se pueda y sigue adelante apoyando a sus hijos, la socia ahora requiere el préstamo para invertir en la compra de chanchos y criarlos hasta que los pueda vender una vez que estos logren reproducirse. La socia solicita el préstamo para invertir en la compra de chanchos.

La socia agradece el préstamo que se le otorgara y se compromete en cumplir con los pagos de sus cuotas de manera disciplinada.
texts.en:
Sra. Fidelia is a member of the Communal Bank “Cristo Asencion de Rumichaca”. This Communal Bank is located in the District and Province of Urubamba, Department of Cusco.

She is 54 years old, single, and has 10 children. Only her 16-year-old and her 14-year-old are still under her care. Fidelia buys and sells flowers at the main market, but she also makes use of her land for growing corn and vegetables. She grows and harvests these products and then takes them to the market to be sold. Fidelia is always working so that she can continue supporting her children and help them move forward. Now she is seeking a loan to invest in the purchase of pigs that she can raise and sell when they are old enough to reproduce. Therefore, she is requesting this loan to invest in the purchase of these animals.

Fidelia is grateful for the loan that has been provided and promises to complete her payments in a disciplined manner.

loans.use: to acquire pigs.

loans.name: Richard David

texts.es:
Richard David tiene 20 años, es soltero vive con los padres en  el Cantón Guaranda Provincia de Bolívar. No Tiene  hijos.

Los miembros de la V.R.C.  SAGRADO CORAZON  se encuentra ubicada en el sector Cuatro Esquinas perteneciente al cantón Guaranda a una distancia de 15 minutos de la oficina de la cooperativa, esta ventanilla integran 12 socios que se dedican a la agricultura, crianza de animales y a la comercialización de los mismos y otras actividades que da utilidades.

Richard se dedica a la agricultura siembra papas, trigo, maíz en terrenos propios, además se dedica a la comercialización de legumbres. Las compras las realiza en el mercado de Guaranda y las vende en el mercado mayorista de la misma ciudad.

Solicita el crédito para la comprar de insumos para los cultivos. Con el apoyo del crédito le ayudaría económicamente para suplir sus necesidades. Enfrenta desafíos como enfermedades en los cultivos. Su sueño es comprar una camioneta.

Le gusta estar con la familia, hacer deporte y bailar en las fiestas.
texts.en:
Richard David is 20 years old, single, and lives with his parents in Guaranda canton, Bolívar province. He does not have any children.

The members of the "Sagrado Corazón" ("Sacred Heart") communal bank can be found located in the Cuatro Esquinas ("Four Corners") sector in the canton of Guaranda, some 15 minutes from the office of Cooperativa San Jose. This communal bank has 12 members who work in agriculture, animal husbandry and sales, and other income-producing activities.

Richard works in agriculture. He plants potatoes, wheat, and corn on his own land, and also sells vegetables. He makes his purchases in the market in Guaranda and sells his goods in the wholesale market in the same city.

He is requesting this loan to buy supplies for his crops. The support from this loan will help him to meet his needs. He faces challenges like crop illnesses. His dream is to buy a pickup truck.

He likes spending time with his family, playing sports, and dancing at parties and festivals.

loans.use: to buy supplies for his crops

loans.name: Ali

texts.en:
Ali is a married man with two children, one of whom attends school while the other is too young. He owns a house that neither has electricity nor piped water.

For the past two years Ali has operated a vegetable stall, selling his produce at the market to his neighbors and passersby. He faces a major challenge from other vegetable stall operators in the area.

Ali decided to join Yehu to access loans to improve his livelihood. With his 20,000 KES loan he wants to purchase tomatoes, onions, potatoes, green vegetables and oranges. He dreams of expanding his business and establishing a retail shop in the future.

loans.use: To purchase tomatoes, onions, potatoes, green vegetables and oranges for his stall.

loans.name: Olpha

texts.en:
Olpha is 26 years old and a hardworking lady. She is married and blessed with two children aged four and five. She has been running a retail shop since 2005.

Olpha joined a group in Faulu Kenya so that she could access business loans easily. So far, she has been able to expand her business with the financial support from Faulu Kenya. She has requested 20, 000 KES to buy maize flour, sugar and cooking fat.

loans.use: To buy maize flour, sugar and cooking fat.

loans.name: Benedicto

texts.es:
El socio pertenece al banco “CRISTO ASENCION DE RUMICHACA”; el Banco Comunal se encuentra ubicado en el distrito de Urubamba, Provincia de Urubamba y departamento de Cusco.

El socio es el Sr. Benedicto; el socio tiene 46 años de edad;  es casado y tiene 7 hijos de 22, 20, 12, 17, 4, 3, 2 años de edad; el socio trabaja en su propia casa el tiene una carpintería y su conyugue una chichería en la misma casa, el socio desea el crédito para poder comprar madera la por mayor y poder realizar trabajos como catres, roperos para exhibirlos y venderlos a sus vecinos, el socio trabaja más de 20 años en carpintería y con su propio negocio trabaja 10 años. El socio solicita el préstamo para invertir en a compra de madera.

El socio agradece el préstamo que se le otorgara y se compromete en cumplir con los pagos de sus cuotas de manera disciplinada.
texts.en:
Benedicto belongs to the communal bank, "Cristo Asención de Rumichaca."  The bank is located in the district of Urubamba in the province of Urubamba in the department of Cusco.

Benedicto is 46; is married; and has 7 children who are 22, 20, 12, 17, 4, 3, and 2.  He works in his own home as a carpenter.  His wife has a "chichería," (a place for making a corn beer) in their house as well.  He would like this loan to buy wood wholesale to make his projects like folding beds and wardrobes to display and to sell to his neighbors.  He has worked in carpentry for more than 20 years and has had his own business for more than 10 years.  He is requesting a loan to invest in the purchase of wood.

He is thankful for the loan that is being offered him, and he promises to comply with his payments in a disciplined manner.

loans.use: to invest in the purchase of wood.

loans.name: Roberto

texts.es:
El socio pertenece al banco comunal “CRISTO ASENCION DE RUMICHACA”; El banco está ubicado en el distrito de URUBAMBA, perteneciente a la provincia de URUBAMBA y departamento de Cusco.

El socio es el Sr. Roberto; el tiene 28 años de edad y es conviviente y tiene 3 hijos; El socio alterna sus actividades diarias con el trabajo en un hotel en el área de jardinería, ella es cuidante de todo el área de jardinería sembrando diferentes flores y también el socio se dedica al negocio de ganadería, el es propietario de vacas y lo vende en las diferentes ferias del distrito de Urubamba, la socia quiere ampliar el negocio de venta de ganados y también mejorar en su trabajo en el área de jardinería. El  socio solicita el préstamo para comprar alimentos para las vacas y para comprar una vaca.
                                                 
El socio está feliz por el préstamo y se compromete a cumplir con los pagos de su cuota.
texts.en:
Roberto belongs to the Cristo Asencion de Rumichaca Communal Bank.  The bank is in the Urubamba district, Urubamba province, Cusco department.

Roberto is 28, has a life partner, and has three children.  He alternates his daily activities with his gardening work at a hotel.  He takes care of all of the garden area, and he plants different flowers.  

He also devotes himself to the livestock business.  He has cows, and he sells them at the different fairs in the district of Urubamba.

He wants to expand his business of selling livestock.  He also wants to improve his gardening work.  He requests the loan to buy feed for the cows and to buy a cow.

He is happy about the loan, and he pledges to make his payments.

loans.use: to buy feed for the cows and to buy a cow.

loans.name: Fredy

texts.es:
El socio pertenece al banco “CRISTO ASENCION DE RUMICHACA”; el Banco Comunal se encuentra ubicado en el distrito de Urubamba, Provincia de Urubamba y departamento de Cusco.

El socio es el Sr; Fredy, el socio tiene 28 años de edad y es conviviente el socio tiene 1 hijo de 3 años de edad, el socio es músico de profesión y es también artesano, el socio elabora diferentes trabajos y muchos de ellos los compra ya hecho y los vende en Urubamba, el socio nos comenta que le apasiona la música razón por la cual lo llevo a formar su propio grupo musical siendo el  cantante principal; El socio desea invertir el crédito en la compra de equipo de sonido para sus presentaciones y solicita el préstamo para hacer realidad su sueño y mejorar su trabajo.

El socio agradece el préstamo que se le otorgara y se compromete en cumplir con los pagos de sus cuotas de manera disciplinada.
texts.en:
Fredy belongs to the communal bank, "Cristo Asención de Rumichaca."  It is located in the district and province of Urubamba in the department of Cusco.

Fredy is 28, has a live-in girlfriend, and has 1 son who is 3.  He is a musician by profession and also an artisan.  He makes various types of art and also buys some that are already made and sells them in Urubamba.  He tells us that he is passionate about music and started his own group of which he is the lead singer.  He hopes to invest his loan in the purchase of stereo equipment for his shows, and he is requesting a loan to make his dream a reality and to improve his work.

He is thankful for the loan that is being offered him and promises to comply with his payments in a disciplined manner.

loans.use: to invest in buying stereo equipment.

loans.name: Jose Donato

texts.es:
El socio pertenece al banco comunal “CRISTO ASENCION DE RUMICHACA”; El banco está ubicado en el distrito de URUBAMBA, perteneciente a la provincia de URUBAMBA y departamento de Cusco.

El socio es el Sr. Jose Donato; el tiene 29 años de edad y es conviviente y tiene 1 hijo; El socio alterna sus actividades diarias con el negocio de transporte, el hace servicio de taxi en las  diferentes calles de la ciudad de Urubamba, el socio trabaja desde las 6:00 a.m hasta las 10:00 p.m y también el socio quiere abrir un negocio de tienda de abarrotes para que su esposa atienda este negocio, el socio quiere ampliar y mejorar el negocio de transporte y también implementar el negocio de tienda de abarrotes. El  socio solicita el préstamo para comprar productos para la tienda de abarrotes como arroz, azúcar, leche y fideos.  
                                              
El socio está feliz por el préstamo y se compromete a cumplir con los pagos de su cuota.
texts.en:
Jose Donato belongs to the Cristo Asencion de Rumichaca Communal Bank.  The bank is in the Urubamba district, Urubamba province, Cusco department.

Jose Donato is 29, married, and has one child.  He alternates his daily activities with his transportation business.  He drives a taxi on the different streets in the city of Urubamba.  He works from 6:00 a.m. until 10:00 p.m.  He also wants to open a grocery store business.  His wife will attend to this business.

He wants to expand and improve his transportation business.  He also wants to set up the grocery store business.

He is requesting a loan to buy products like rice, sugar, milk, and noodles for the grocery store.

He is happy about the loan, and he pledges to make his payments.

loans.use: to buy products like rice, sugar, milk, and noodles for the grocery store.

loans.name: Florence

texts.en:
Florence is married and has two children, all of whom are in school. She lives in a home that she rents; she doesn't have access to electricity or piped water. Her major monthly expenses include school fees and food for the family.

Florence has a food stall in Uganda where she sells her products at retail. She has been in business for three years, and she works seven days a week. The main business challenges for Florence include seasonality and the perishability of tomatoes.

Florence has requested a loan of 300,000 UGX from MCDT SACCO, which she will use to buy more baskets of tomatoes and onions. Her goals and aspirations for her business are to start growing tomatoes and onions herself.

loans.use: To buy more baskets of tomatoes and onions for her stall.

loans.name: Julia

texts.es:
La socia pertenece al banco comunal “CRISTO ASENCION DE RUMICHACA”; El banco está ubicado en el distrito de URUBAMBA, perteneciente a la provincia de URUBAMBA,  y departamento de Cusco.

La socia es la Sra. Julia; ella tiene 28 años de edad y es soltera y tiene 1 hijo; La socia alterna sus actividades diarias con el negocio de venta de ceviche que es un plato que es a base de pescado con limón y rocoto acompañado de camote, ella vende en el mercado de Urubamba desde las 9:00 a.m hasta a las 4:00 p.m,la socia quiere ampliar el negocio de venta de ceviche. La socia solicita el préstamo para comprar insumos para preparar el ceviche como pesacdo, limones, camotes y rocotos.
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                  
 La socia está feliz por el préstamo y se compromete a cumplir con los pagos de su cuota.
texts.en:
Julia, 28, is a member of the “Cristo Asención de Rumichaca” communal bank which is located in Urubamba District belonging to Urubamba Province, Cusco Department.

She’s single and has a son.  She alternates her daily chores with selling ceviche, which is a dish made from fish with lemon and peppers served with sweet potato, in Urubamba’s market from 9am until 4pm.  She wants to expand the business and is asking for a loan to buy ingredients to make ceviche like lemons, sweet potatoes and peppers.

She is happy with the loan and commits to make her installment payments.

loans.use: to buy ingredients to make ceviche.

loans.name: Higidia

texts.es:
La socia pertenece al banco comunal “CRISTO ASENCION DE RUMICHACA”; El banco está ubicado en el distrito de URUBAMBA, perteneciente a la provincia de URUBAMBA,  y departamento de Cusco.

La socia es la Sra. Higidia; ella tiene 40 años de edad y es casada y tiene 3 hijos; La socia alterna sus actividades diarias con el negocio de taller de confecciones, ella confeccionan pantalones, blusas y ternos a pedido del público en general, la socia trabaja desde las 8:00 a.m hasta las 6:00 p.m, por medio de este negocio la socia saca adelante a sus hijos, la socia quiere ampliar el negocio de taller de confecciones. La socia solicita el préstamo para comprar materiales para confeccionar como tela, hilos y cierres.                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                    
 La socia está feliz por el préstamo y se compromete a cumplir con los pagos de su cuota.
texts.en:
Higidia, 40, is a member of the “Cristo Asención de Rumichaca” communal bank which is located in Urubamba District belonging to Urubamba Province, Cusco Department.

She is married and has three children. She alternates her daily chores with a dressmaking shop.   She makes pants, blouses and three-piece suits to order for the general public.  She works from 8am until 6pm and earnings from the business allow her to support her children.  She wants to expand the workshop and is asking for a loan to buy supplies like fabric, thread and closures.

She is happy about the loan and commits to make her installment payments.

loans.use: to buy sewing supplies.

loans.name: Ancille

texts.en:
Ancille is 45 years old and married with six children between 3 and 15 years old. She sells charcoal. Her business is well organized. Ancille has two years experience and she works from 7 a.m. until 6 p.m. every day except on the weekend. Ancille currently employs six people to help her.

She has requested a loan from Kiva lenders via Vision Finance Company in order to purchase more wood to make charcoal to sell. With any profit, Ancille will reinvest in her business and save for her future.

loans.use: To purchase more wood to make charcoal to sell.

loans.name: Emperatriz

texts.es:
La socia pertenece al banco comunal “CRISTO ASENCION DE RUMICHACA”; El banco está ubicado en el distrito de URUBAMBA, perteneciente a la provincia de URUBAMBA,  y departamento de Cusco.

La socia es la Sra. Emperatriz; ella tiene 44 años de edad y es casada y tiene 7 hijos; La socia alterna sus actividades diarias con el negocio de venta de chicha (bebida a base de maíz) y crianza de animales, la socia cría pollo y cuyes y la venta de chicha lo realiza en su casa en forma ambulatoria, la socia quiere ampliar el negocio de venta de chicha y crianza de animales. La socia solicita el préstamo para comprar animales y para comprar insumos para hacer la chicha como maíz y jora.
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                  
 La socia está feliz por el préstamo y se compromete a cumplir con los pagos de su cuota.
texts.en:
Emperatriz, 44, is a member of the “Cristo Asención de Rumichaca” communal bank which is located in Urubamba District belonging to Urubamba Province, Cusco Department.

She’s married and has 7 children.  She alternates her daily chores with chicha sales (corn based beverage) and with raising farm animals; she raises chickens and guinea pigs.  She is a home-based chicha vendor.  She wants to expand both businesses and is asking for a loan to buy animals and to buy ingredients to make chicha like corn and jora.

She is happy with the loan and commits to make her installment payments.

loans.use: to buy animals and to buy chicha making ingredients like corn and jora.

loans.name: Justina Antonia

texts.es:
La socia pertenece al banco comunal “SEÑOR DE HUANCA”; el banco se encuentra ubicado en el Distrito de Calca en la Provincia de Urubamba y Departamento de Cusco.

La socia es la Sra. Justina; la socia tiene 38 años de edad, la socia es casada, La socia tiene 3 hijos 18, 11, 5 años de edad; La socia se dedica a la compra y venta de maíz y a la venta de productos secos; en estos la socia vende moraya, todo tipo de maíz, habas, cereales; La socia solicita el préstamo para invertir en la compra de productos secos para implementar su negocio.

La socia agradece el apoyo que se le otorgara y así mismo se compromete a cumplir de manera disciplinada con los pagos de las cuotas.
texts.en:
Justina, 38, is a member of the “Señor de Huanca” communal bank which is located in Calca District in Urubamba Province and Cusco Department.

She is married and has three children who are 18, 11 and 5 years of age.  She is a corn and dry goods merchant.  She sells dehydrated potato, all sorts of corn, broad beans and cereals.  She requests the loan to buy dry goods to stock her business.

She is grateful for the support that will be granted her and commits to repay her installments in a disciplined manner.

loans.use: to buy dry goods.

loans.name: Paul

texts.en:
Paul is married and has two children, ages 5 and 7. He has been repairing electronics, cameras, and televisions for over 10 years. Paul serves all types of customers in his community. He hopes to use this loan to purchase more parts in order boost his business. 

Paul plans to use the profits from his business to pay for his children’s education. He hopes to expand his business and open a branch one day. Paul describes himself as honest and god-fearing.

loans.use: to purchase more parts in order boost his electronics business

loans.name: Hilda

texts.es: Hilda de 43 años convive con Zacarías de 44 años, que fruto de este amor tienen 3 hijos. Ellos viven en el centro poblado de Canayre del distrito de LLochegua. Hilda, desde muy joven incursionó en el mundo de los negocios, es por esta razón que ahora cuenta con un hospedaje. Asimismo posee un terreno agrícola en donde siembra cacao y en medio de este trabajo decidió vender productos agroquímicos, que es un negocio rentable ya que le genera un ingreso económico  para el bienestar de su familia. Sin embargo ella desea mejorar aún más el establecimiento que tiene, es por esta razón que acude a MFP para solicitar un nuevo crédito. Este será su tercer crédito con MFP por lo que pide la colaboración de cada uno de ustedes para desarrollar su negocio. Con los 2.000 nuevos soles desea implementar su tienda con nuevos productos agroquímicos.
texts.en:
Hilda, 43, lives with Zacarías, 44 and their three children.  They live in the middle of Canayre settlement in Llochegua District.  

From a very young age, Hilda went into the world of business and now has an inn.  She also owns a piece of farmland where she grows cocoa beans and while in this occupation decided to go into the sale of agrochemical products which is a very profitable business that generates income for her family’s wellbeing.  

However, she wants to improve her establishment still more and this is why she’s called upon MFP to request a new loan.  This will be her third loan with MFP so she is asking for the collaboration of each one of you in order to develop her business.  She will use the requested 2000 new soles to stock her store with new agrochemical products.

loans.use: to buy agrochemical supplies to stock her store.

loans.name: Libia

texts.es:
La socia pertenece al banco comunal “SEÑOR DE HUANCA”; el banco se encuentra ubicado en el Distrito de Calca en la Provincia de Urubamba y Departamento de Cusco.

La socia es la Sra. Libia; la socia tiene 56 años de edad, la socia es soltera, La socia tiene 4 hijos los cuales 3 son independientes y el menor tiene 33 años de edad; La socia se dedica al comercio minorista, la socia tiene una tienda de abarrotes y la socia desea implementar  su negocio ella requiere el crédito para comprar productos de primera necesidad como arroz, azúcar, fideos, harinas, leche y cerveza para implementar su tienda de abarrotes. La socia solicita el préstamo para invertir en la compra de productos para implementar la tienda de abarrotes..

La socia agradece el apoyo que se le otorgara y así mismo se compromete a cumplir de manera disciplinada con los pagos de las cuotas.
texts.en:
Libia, 56, is a member of the “Señor de Huanca” communal bank located in Calca District in Urubamba Province and Cusco Department.

She is single and has four children.  Three of them live independently and the youngest is 33 years old.  Libia is a retailer.  She has a grocery store that she wants to stock.  She needs the loan to buy basic need items like rice, sugar, noodles, flour, milk and beer to stock her grocery store.  She is asking for the loan to buy products to stock the store.

She is grateful for the support she’ll get and commits to pay her installments in a disciplined manner.

loans.use: to buy stock items for her store.

loans.name: Faraj

texts.en: Faraj has been selling shoes for the last 2 years. He gets additional income from his rental houses. He is married and blessed with a 2-year-old child. In the next 5 years, he wants to open up a wholesale shop. He is grateful to Faulu Kenya for teaching him the art of saving. He has requested 50,000 KES to buy shoes.

loans.use: to buy shoes

loans.name: Melicendra

texts.es:
La socia pertenece al banco comunal “SEÑOR DE HUANCA”; el banco se encuentra ubicado en el Distrito de Calca en la Provincia de Urubamba y Departamento de Cusco.

La socia es la Sra. Melicendra; la socia tiene 27 años de edad, la socia es conviviente, La socia tiene 2 hijos de 6 y 3 años de edad; La socia se dedica al comercio minorista, la socia tiene una tienda de abarrotes y la socia desea invertir el crédito para la implementación de  su tienda de abarrotes la socia desea comprar productos de primera necesidad como arroz, azúcar, fideos, harinas, leche para implementar su tienda de abarrotes. La socia solicita el préstamo para invertir en la compra de productos para implementar la tienda de abarrotes.

La socia agradece el apoyo que se le otorgara y así mismo se compromete a cumplir de manera disciplinada con los pagos de las cuotas.
texts.en:
Melicendra, 27, is a member of the “Señor de Huanca” communal bank located in Calca District in Urubamba Province and Cusco Department.

She has a spouse and two children who are 6 and 3 years of age.  She is a retailer.  She has a grocery store and she wants to invest the loan to buy basic need items like rice, sugar, noodles, flour and milk to stock the grocery store.  She is asking for the loan to invest in the purchase of products to stock the grocery store.

She is grateful for the support she’ll be granted and commits to make her installment payments in a disciplined manner.

loans.use: to buy stock items for her grocery store.

loans.name: Dropati

texts.en:
Dropati is 42 years old. She is married and has 2 children, ages 25 and 22. In 1998, she established her poultry business. Working 7 days a week and 5 hours a day, she supports her family. She has already received and successfully repaid 2 loans from Patan BPW and used her most recent loan to purchase small chicks for her business.  

In the future, Dropati plans to uplift the economic condition of her family. She thanks you for your support. 

In the Kathmandu Valley, raising poultry for eggs and meat is a very profitable business. Kiva loans are used to purchase chicks, food, and necessary medicine to keep the chickens healthy. Once matured, the chickens are sold at small butcher shops or in the many open air markets throughout the valley.

loans.use: to buys small chicks

loans.name: Marcelino

texts.es: Marcelino tiene 52 años, casado con Ernestina de 49 años, fruto de esta relación tienen 3 hijos. Ellos viven en su casa propia ubicada en el centro poblado de Canayre del distrito de LLochegua. Para Marcelino, el trabajo que realiza lo vitaliza, la innovación, creatividad, y el ser mejor cada día ha sido la clave de éxito en su vida. Es así que posee un taller de fabricación de muebles, en  donde sus clientes se sienten satisfechos con el trabajo que realiza. Sin embargo en su carpintería le faltan algunas cosas, pero se las ingenia de manera eficiente y eficaz para cumplir con sus compromisos de entrega en un tiempo record, y ya lleva 20 años laborando de manera constante. A pesar de que va mejorando sus ventas con respecto a los meses anteriores, el planea en el futuro adquirir máquinas para su carpintería, con el propósito de darle un mejor acabado a sus muebles. Su negocio está ubicado en un lugar estratégico dentro de su misma localidad, donde él trabaja de manera independiente, pero cuando lo hacen grandes pedidos, tiene a cargo de sus trabajadores que le puedan facilitar la fabricación en un menor tiempo. Este será su tercer crédito con MFP, por tanto pide la colaboración de ustedes para desarrollar su negocio. Con los 1.000 nuevos soles comprará más herramientas de carpintería.
texts.en:
Marcelino, 52, is married to Ernestina, 49.  They have three children.  They live in their own house located in the middle of Canayre settlement in Llochegua District.  

For Marcelino, his work energizes him.  Innovation, creativity and being the best he can be day by day have been the keys to his success in life.  He has a furniture making shop where his customers feel satisfied with the work he does.  However, his carpentry shop still lacks some things.  Nevertheless, he figures out ways to efficiently and effectively meet his commitments and deliver in record time.  He’s been working non-stop for 20 years.

Despite improving sales compared to previous months he plans in future to acquire machinery for his carpentry aimed at giving his furniture better finishes.

His business is located in a strategic spot within his own community where he works independently.  When he gets large orders, though, he hires employees to help him get the work done more easily in a short period of time.

This will be his third loan with MFP so he’s asking for everyone’s collaboration to develop his business.  He will use the 1000 new soles to buy more carpentry tools.

loans.use: to buy tools to facilitate furniture manufacturing.

loans.name: Shrijana

texts.en:
Shrijana is 26 years old. She is married and has one child, age 2. In 2006, she established her business raising cows. Working 7 days a week and 5 hours a day, she supports her family. She has already received and successfully repaid 1 loan from Patan BPW and used her most recent loan to purchase a cow.  

In the future, Shrijana plans to uplift the economic condition of her family. She thanks you for your support. 

Dairy cows are an important source of nutrition and income in Nepal. Cows are never raised for beef, but for their milk from which curd (duy) and fresh cheese (paneer) are made. Jersey cows are the preferred breed for milking. On average, a dairy cow in Nepal will produce about 10 liters of milk each day. In the local market, a liter of milk sells for about USD $0.50. In addition to producing milk, cows provide dung that is used in home construction, as fuel for fires, and can be captured in methane storage tanks. The purchase of a dairy cow, made possible through a Kiva loan, is an investment that will repay itself many times over.

loans.use: to buy a young cow

loans.name: Faraffina 1 Group

texts.fr:
Le groupe de solidarité FARAFFINA  a été créé le 31/05/2007.IL est composé de 21 femmes habitant le même quartier et qui mènent la même activité,qui est le petit commerce.
