Madame AISSATOU à droite de la photo levant légèrement la main, avec l'écharpe noire, est responsable du groupement.Elle est âgée de 49 ans,est mariée et mère de 06 enfants.

Elle est vendeuse de légumes et de condiments au niveau du marché central.
Elle dispose d'une bonne expérience de cette vente pour avoir pratiquer cette activité plusieurs années.

Son prêt lui permettra de s'approvisionner en quantité suffisante afin de pouvoir satisfaire sa clientèle.

Son objectif est de renforcer ses épargnes et améliorer les conditions de vie de sa progéniture par des ressources additionnelles.
texts.en:
The Faraffina 1 Solidarity Group was created on May 31, 2007. It is composed of 21 women who live in the same neighborhood and have the same activity, namely small business.

Mrs Aissatou, standing on the right side in the photo wearing a black scarf and slightly raising her hand, is responsible for this group. She is 49 years old, married and the mother of six children. She sells vegetables and food condiments at the central market. She is well experienced in her trade because she has practiced it for several  years.

Her loan will enable her to buy goods in sufficient quantities to meet the demand of her customers. Her goal is to boost her savings and improve the standard of living of her offspring through additional resources.

loans.use: to buy vegetables and food condiments.

loans.name: Alicia

texts.es:
La socia pertenece al banco comunal “SEÑOR DE HUANCA”; el banco se encuentra ubicado en el Distrito de Calca en la Provincia de Urubamba y Departamento de Cusco.

La socia es la Sra. Alicia; la socia tiene 31 años de edad, la socia es conviviente, La socia tiene 2 hijos de 5 y 1 años y 6 meses de edad; La socia se dedica al comercio minorista, la socia cría animales menores como cuyes, gallinas, pollos, chanchos tiernos y cuando logran la madurez y la procreación de alguno de ellos la socia los lleva a vender en el mercado central en Calca, la socia abastece de cuyes a los restaurantes típicos en la zona del valle sagrado y ahora ella requiere el crédito para poder comprar cuyes al por mayor y un par de chanchos, la socia desea invertir en su negocio. La socia solicita el préstamo para poder comprar cuyes al por mayor y un par de chanchos tiernos.

La socia agradece el apoyo que se le otorgara y así mismo se compromete a cumplir de manera disciplinada con los pagos de las cuotas.
texts.en:
The member belongs to the SEÑOR DE HUANCA communal bank located in the Calca district, Urubamba province, Cusco department.

She is Alicia, 31, in a common-law marriage and she has 2 children of 5 and 1 and ½.  She sells retail and raises small animals such as guinea pigs, hens, chickens, and piglets.  When they are grown and some have given birth, the member takes them to the central market in Calca to sell.  She supplies the guinea pigs to “typical” restaurants in the sacred valley and she now needs a loan to buy guinea pigs wholesale and a pair of piglets.  She would like to invest in the business and she is requesting the financing to buy the guinea pigs and piglets.

She is grateful for the support offered her and promises to make the payments in a disciplined manner.

loans.use: to buy guinea pigs and a pair of piglets wholesale

loans.name: Sop Serigne Fallou Group

texts.fr:
Le groupe de solidarité Sop Serigne Fallou du Banc Villageois de Rabba Mbacké est composé de vingt neuf femmes qui ont des liens de parenté,voisinage et d'amitié.Il est créé le 10 décembre 2010.Les activités menées sont le petit commerce,l'agriculture,l'élevage ovine, la couture et broderie.

Madame Soda est mariée mère de trois enfants; elle est âgée de 23 ans et s'active dans la transformation et la vente de produits halieutiques. Elle a une bonne expérience pour le commerce de détail. Sur la photo, elle est debout à droite juste derrière de la femme assisse en boubou jaune. 

Elle achéte ses produits: poissons,yett(mollusque),huîtres et crevettes séchées,dans les marchés hebdomadaires et les revend au marché central de Darou Mousty.

Son prêt lui servira à renforcer son activité afin de gagner plus de revenus.

Avec ses bénéfices obtenus, elle participe aux dépenses de la famille pour un bien être des enfants; elle compte aussi augmenter son épargne.
texts.en:
The solidarity group Sop Serigne Fallou of the Rabba Mbacké Village Loan Group is composed of 19 women who are linked through family, friendship, and neighbourhood ties. It was created on 10 December 2010. These women run small businesses, farm, raise sheep, make clothing, and embroider.

Ms. Soda is a married mother of three; she is 23 years old and is active in processing and selling seafood products. She has lots of experience in commerce and retail. In the photo, she is standing on the right, just behind the seated woman in the yellow boubou.

She buys her goods - fish, yett (cymbium molluscs), oysters, and dried shrimp - at the weekly markets and re-sells them at the central market in Darou Mousty.

Her loan will allow her to strengthen her business in order to earn more income.

With her profits, she contributes to providing for her family and to her children's well-being; she also intends to increase her savings.

loans.use: To buy and process seafood destined for sale.

loans.name: Narayani

texts.en:
Narayani is 48 years old. She is married and has 4 children, ages 29, 27, 25 and 22. In 2000, she established her business raising cows. Working 7 days a week and 5 hours a day, she supports her family. She has already received and successfully repaid 2 loans from Patan BPW and used her most recent loan to purchase a cow.  

In the future, Narayani plans to uplift the economic condition of her family. She thanks you for your support. 

Dairy cows are an important source of nutrition and income in Nepal. Cows are never raised for beef, but for their milk from which curd (duy) and fresh cheese (paneer) are made. Jersey cows are the preferred breed for milking. On average, a dairy cow in Nepal will produce about 10 liters of milk each day. In the local market, a liter of milk sells for about USD $0.50. In addition to producing milk, cows provide dung that is used in home construction, as fuel for fires, and can be captured in methane storage tanks. The purchase of a dairy cow, made possible through a Kiva loan, is an investment that will repay itself many times over.

loans.use: to buy a young cow

loans.name: Vilma

texts.es:
La socia pertenece al banco comunal “SEÑOR DE HUANCA”; el banco se encuentra ubicado en el Distrito de Calca en la Provincia de Urubamba y Departamento de Cusco.

La socia es la Sra. Vilma; la socia tiene 29 años de edad, la socia es casada, La socia tiene 1 hijo de 15 años La socia se dedica al comercio minorista, la socia compra al por mayor maíz blanco y tara, la tara es una planta medicinal para las afecciones en la garganta, la socia compra al por mayor y los vende en el mercado de Calca ella tiene su stand , la socia desea invertir el préstamo en la compra de maíz al por mayor y de tara para la venta al menor en su stand.

La socia agradece el apoyo que se le otorgara y así mismo se compromete a cumplir de manera disciplinada con los pagos de las cuotas.
texts.en:
Vilma, 29, is a member of the “Señor de Huanca” communal bank located in Calca District in Urubamba Province and Cusco Department.

She is married and has a 15-year-old son.  She is a retailer.  She buys white corn and "tara" (a medicinal plant used to treat throat infections) at wholesale.  She buys them at wholesale and then sells them at her stand in the Calca market.  She wants to invest the loan in purchasing corn and "tara" at wholesale for subsequent resale at retail in her stand.

She is grateful for the support she’ll get and commits to make her installment payments in a disciplined manner.

loans.use: to buy merchandise.

loans.name: Sop Serigne Khadim Mbacke Group

texts.fr:
Le groupe de solidarité Sop Serigne Khadim Mbacké du Banc Villageois de Darou Baïla 2 est créé en décembre 2010, il est au cycle 2; il est composé de trente trois femmes issues du même quartier, elles sont voisines,parentes et amies. La principale activité menée par le groupe est le petit commerce mais parallèlement certaines font de la couture et d'autres de la transformation d'huile artisanale.


Madame Amy la responsable est âgée de 29 ans; elle est mariée mère de 7 enfants et a un neveu en charge. Elle mène une activité de petit commerce de chaussures et de vêtements et aussi elle fait du raffinage artisanale d'huile d'arachide et a une bonne expérience de plus de dix ans. Sur la photo elle est tout à fait à droite habillée en tissu wax vert jaune et a mis les mains sur ses reins.

Elle achéte ses chaussures et vêtements pour femmes,hommes, enfants à Dakar où elle vend également son huile.


Amy souhaite avec son prêt renforcer son activité en achetant en quantité et en qualité ses produits afin de satisfaire sa clientèle et se faire assez de revenus.


Elle compte avec les bénéfices attendus subvenir aux besoins familiaux; tout en pensant à épargner pour obtenir un crédit plus élevé.
texts.en:
The solidarity group Sop Serigne Khadim Mbacké of the Darou Baïla Village Loan Group was created in December 2010 and is on its second loan cycle. It is composed of 33 women who come from the same area; they are neighbours, family relations, and friends. The main activity of the group members is the running of small retail businesses, but some of the members also make dresses while others prepare traditional hand-made oils.

Ms. Amy, the group leader, is 29 years old. She is a married mother of seven, and also has a nephew in her care. She runs a small business selling shoes and clothing and also makes peanut oil by hand - she has gained over ten years of solid experience in this field. In the photo, she is all the way on the right, dressed in yellow and green 'tissu wax' fabric with her hands on her lower back.

She buys shoes and clothing for women, men, and children in Dakar, where she also sells her oil.

With this loan, Amy hopes to strengthen her business by buying her goods in sufficient quantity and quality in order to satisfy her customers and earn enough income.

She intends to use the future profits to provide for her family, all the while thinking about increasing her savings in order to obtain a greater loan.

loans.use: To buy and re-sell various products.

loans.name: Adja Group

texts.fr:
Le groupe de solidarité est créé le 03 juin 2011. Il est  constitué de dix femmes qui habitent le même quartier. Leur activité principale est le petit commerce.

Madame Safiétou qui est à la droite de la photo levant la main est responsable de groupe. Elle est âgée de 53 ans. Elle est mariée et mère de huit enfants. Elle a aussi en sa charge cinq autres enfants confié par ses parents.

Elle s’active dans la vente de denrée alimentaire et du savon. Elle a une bonne expérience dans ce domaine d’activité, car étant pratiquer depuis plusieurs années.

Ce prêt lui permettra de renforcer son capital et de mieux développer  ses activités.

Les profits lui permettront d’améliorer les conditions de vie de la famille (santé, nourriture, habillement etc.…) et d’augmenter ses épargnes.
texts.en:
This solidarity group was created on 3 June 2011. It comprises ten women who live in the same area. Their main activity consists of running small businesses.

Ms. Safiétou, with the raised hand on the right in the photo, is the group leader. She is 53 years old. She is married and has eight children. She also has five additional children in her care, all of whom where entrusted to her by their parents.

She is active in selling foodstuffs and soap. She has gained solid experience in this field, having been involved in it for several years.

This loan will allow her to strengthen her capital and better develop her business.

The profits will allow her to improve her family's living conditions (health, nutrition, clothing, etc.) and increase her savings.

loans.use: To buy foodstuffs and soap.

loans.name: Marino

texts.es: Marino tiene 45 años, esta casado con Cerafina de 47 años, quien fruto de este gran amor tienen  4 hijos. Juntos viven en su casa propia ubicada en el centro poblado de Canayre del distrito de LLochegua. Marino se caracteriza por ser un hombre muy aguerrido, desde muy joven empezó a tener su pequeña parcela de terreno (que sus padres lo habían obsequiado), donde le sacó mucho provecho cultivando cacao. En el presente con una cantidad considerable de tierras, cultiva y comercializa sus productos de cacao, con la finalidad de mejorar la calidad de vida su familia. Para Marino sus hijos son la razón de existir, ya que le dan muchas fuerzas de seguir adelante por más que en el camino esté lleno de obstáculos. Generalmente sus productos los vende en los centros de acopio de su localidad, por lo que sus ventas están mejorando con respecto al mes anterior y eso le da una estabilidad económica. Este será su segundo crédito con MFP por lo que espera el apoyo de cada uno de ustedes para continuar con su trabajo y dar lo mejor a su familia. Con los 3.000 nuevos soles, realizará la limpieza de sus terrenos, quitando la maleza que crece entre las plantas de cacao, para ello contratará jornaleros.
texts.en:
Marino, 45, is married to Cerafina, 47, and their great love has produced four children.  They live together in their own house located in the middle of Canayre settlement in Llochegua District.

Marino is a very experienced man.  He started working his small plot of land while still very young (his parents gave it to him) growing cocoa beans and gaining much profit from it.  At present, with a considerable amount of land, he grows and sells cocoa beans with the goal in mind of improving his family’s quality of life.  For Marcelino, his children are his reason to live because they give him strength to continue forward regardless of how full of obstacles his path may be.

He usually sells his products at the local gathering centers and his sales are improving compared to last month and this gives him economic stability.  This will be his second loan with MFP and he hopes to get support from each one of you to continue working and providing the best for his family.

He will use the 3000 new soles to clear his fields of weeds that grow between the cocoa bean plants; to do so, he will hire day laborers.

loans.use: to hire day laborers to clear weeds from the fields.

loans.name: Kadiamor Group

texts.fr:
Le groupe de solidarité est créé le 03juin 2011. Il est composé de quatre femmes qui habitent le même quartier. Leur activité principale est le petit commerce.

Madame Kardiatou qui est à la droite de la photo levant la main et le responsable de groupe. Elle est âgée de 33 ans. Elle est mariée et mère de deux enfants. 

Elle s’active dans la vente de sucre, de l'ognon et de l'huile. Elle a une bonne expérience dans ce domaine d’activité, qu'elle pratique depuis plusieurs années.

Ce prêt lui permettra de renforcer son capital et de mieux développer  ses activités.

Les bénéfices réalisés à partir de son activité lui permettront d’améliorer les conditions de vie de la famille (santé, nourriture, habillement etc.…) et d’augmenter ses épargnes.
texts.en:
The Kadiamor Solidarity Group was created on June 3, 2011. It is composed of four women living in the same neighborhood. Their main activity is small business.

Kardiatou, the first person on the right in the photograph and raising her hand, is the president of the group. She is 33 years old, married and the mother of two children.

She sells sugar, onions and oil. She is highly experienced in this trade, which she has practiced for several years. This loan will enable her to strengthen her working capital and better develop her activity. The profit that she is going to earn from this activity will enable her to improve her family's living standard (healthcare, food, clothing, etc.) and increase her savings.

loans.use: to buy onions, oil and sugar.

loans.name: Olga Piedad

texts.es:
Olga Piedad tiene 26 años, es soltera vive con los padres en  el Cantón Guaranda Provincia de Bolívar. No Tiene  hijos.

Los miembros de la V.R.C.  SAGRADO CORAZON  se encuentra ubicada en el sector Cuatro Esquinas perteneciente al cantón Guaranda a una distancia de 15 minutos de la oficina de la cooperativa, esta ventanilla integran 12 socios que se dedican a la agricultura, crianza de animales y a la comercialización de los mismos y otras actividades que da utilidades.

Olga se dedica a la agricultura siembra papas, trigo, maíz, además se dedica a la comercialización de legumbres. Las compras las realiza en el mercado de Guaranda y las vende en el mercado mayorista de la misma ciudad.

Solicita el crédito para la comprar de insumos para los cultivos. Con el apoyo del crédito le ayudaría económicamente para suplir sus necesidades. Enfrenta desafíos como enfermedades en los cultivos. Su sueño es tener terrenos propios y comprar una casa.

Le gusta dedicarse al hogar.
texts.en:
Olga Piedad is 26, single, and she lives with her parents in the Guaranda canton, Bolivar province.  She doesn't have any children.

The members are with the Sagrado Corazon communal bank, located in Cuatro Esquinas, in the Guaranda province, 15 minutes from the cooperative's office. This branch is made up of 12 members who work in farming, animal raising and sales of both and other useful activities.

Olga grows potatoes, wheat, corn and also sells beans.  She purchases them in Guaranda and sells them to a wholesaler in the same city.

She is requesting a loan to buy supplies for the farming and she will use the loan for what she needs.  She faces problems with plant disease with the crops.  Her dream is to have her own fields and to buy a house.

She likes to work in her home.

loans.use: To buy supplies for farming

loans.name: Kagoror Group

texts.fr:
Le groupe de solidarité est créé le 03 juin 2011. Il est composé de neuf femmes qui habitent le même quartier. Leur activité principale est le petit commerce.

Madame Fatou Bintou qui est à la droite de la photo levant la main et le responsable de groupe. Elle est âgée de 51 ans. Elle est mariée et mère de cinq enfants. Elle a aussi en sa charge deux autres enfants confié par ses parents.

Elle s’active dans la vente de jus de fruits et de l'eau fraiche conditionnée dans des sachets. Elle a une bonne expérience dans ce domaine d’activité, car étant pratiquer depuis plusieurs années.

Ce prêt lui permettra de renforcer son capital et de mieux développer  ses activités.

Les profits lui permettront d’améliorer les conditions de vie de la famille (santé, nourriture, habillement etc.…) et d’augmenter ses épargnes.
texts.en:
This solidarity group was created on June 3, 2010. It comprises nine women who live in the same area. Their main work involves small-scale commerce. 

Ms. Fatou Bintou (at the right in the photo with her hand raised) is the group's official. She is 51 years old, married, and the mother of five children. She also supports two other children entrusted to her by her parents. 

Fatou is active in selling fruit juices and cold fresh water in plastic pouches. She has good experience in this domain of work, since she has been working at it for several years. 

This loan will enable her to boost her capital and to develop her business further. The profits will allow her to improve her family's living conditions (health, food, clothing, etc.) and to increase her savings.

loans.use: to buy fruit

loans.name: Atadior Group

texts.fr:
Le groupe de solidarité est créé le 03 juin 2010. Il est  composé de quinze femmes qui habitent le même quartier. Leur activité principale est le petit commerce.

Madame Gloria qui est à la droite de la photo levant la main et le responsable de groupe. Elle est âgée de 53 ans. Elle est mariée et mère de cinq enfants. Elle a aussi en sa charge trois autres enfants confié par ses parents.

Elle s’active dans la vente de  sucre et de tissu teinté. Elle a une bonne expérience dans ce domaine d’activité, car étant pratiquer depuis plusieurs années.

Ce prêt lui permettra d'augmenter son capital et de mieux développer  ses activités.

Les profits lui permettront d’améliorer les conditions de vie de la famille (santé, nourriture, habillement etc.…).
texts.en:
This solidarity group was created on June 3, 2010. It comprises fifteen women who live in the same area. Their main work involves small-scale commerce. Ms. Gloria (at the right in the photo with her hand raised) is the group's official. She is 53 years old, married, and the mother of five children. She also supports three other children entrusted to her by her parents. 

Ms. Gloria is active in selling sugar and dyed cloth. She has good experience in this work domain, since she has been working at it for several years. 

This loan will enable her to boost her capital and to develop her business further. The profits will allow her to improve her family's living conditions (health, food, clothing, etc.)

loans.use: to buy sugar and dyed fabrics

loans.name: Paulo Cesar

texts.es:
El socio pertenece al banco comunal “SEÑOR DE HUANCA”; el banco se encuentra ubicado en el Distrito de Calca en la Provincia de Urubamba y Departamento de Cusco.

El socio tiene 33 años de edad, el socio es conviviente, El socio tiene 1 hijo de 2 años y 6 meses; El socio es docente de profesión y es artista, el socio actualmente se dedica a la artesanía, el socio realiza trabajos y pinturas andinas, el socio tiene en Pisac una galería de arte y el socio desea invertir el préstamo en la compra de materiales así como pinceles, pinturas, marcos y todo lo referente al trabajo en pintura. El socio solicita el préstamo para invertir en la compra de materiales para realizar pinturas de arte y exhibirlas en la galería.

La socia agradece el apoyo que se le otorgara y así mismo se compromete a cumplir de manera disciplinada con los pagos de las cuotas.
texts.en:
The member belongs to the “Señor de Huanca” communal bank located in Calca District in Urubamba Province and Cusco Department.

He is 33 years old and has a live-in partner.  He has a son who is two-and-a-half.  He is a Teacher by profession and also an Artist.  He currently works as an artisan.  He paints Andean scenes.  He has an art gallery in Pisac and wants to use the loan to buy art supplies like brushes, paints, frames and everything related to painting.  He is asking for the loan to buy supplies to make paintings to exhibit in the gallery.

He is grateful for the support that will be granted and commits to make his installment payments in a disciplined manner.

loans.use: to buy art supplies.

loans.name: Kassofor Group

texts.fr:
Le groupe de solidarité est créé le 03juin 2010. Ledit groupe est  constitué de onze femmes qui habitent le même quartier. Leur activité principale est le petit commerce.
Madame Fatou Bintou qui est à la droite de la photo levant la main et le responsable de groupe. Elle est âgée de 48 ans. Elle est mariée et mère de trois enfants. Elle a aussi en sa charge trois autres enfants confié par ses parents.
Elle s’active dans la vente de poisson et de sucre. Elle a une bonne expérience dans ce domaine d’activité, qu'elle pratique depuis plusieurs années.
Ce prêt lui permettra de renforcer son capital et d'accroitre  ses activités.
Les profits lui permettront d’améliorer les conditions de vie de la famille (santé, nourriture, habillement etc.…) et d’augmenter ses épargnes.
texts.en:
This solidarity group was created on June 3, 2010. It comprises eleven women who live in the same area. Their main work involves small-scale commerce. Ms. Fatou Bintou (at the right in the photo with her hand raised) is the group's official. She is 48 years old, married, and the mother of three children. She also supports three other children entrusted to her by her parents. 

Fatou is active in selling fish and sugar. She has good experience in this domain of work, which she has been doing for several years. 

This loan will enable her to boost her capital and to increase her business. The profits will allow her to improve her family's living conditions (health, food, clothing, etc.) and to increase her savings.

loans.use: to buy fish and sugar

loans.name: Diamoral Group

texts.fr:
Le groupe de solidarité est créé le 03 juin 2010. Ledit groupe est  constitué de dix femmes qui habitent le même quartier. Leur activité principale est le petit commerce.

Madame Fatou Bintou qui est à la droite de la photo levant la main et le responsable de groupe. Elle est âgée de 32 ans. Elle est mariée et mère de deux enfants. Elle a aussi en sa charge un de ses neveux.

Elle s’active dans la vente de savon. Elle a une bonne expérience dans ce domaine d’activité, qu'elle pratique  depuis plusieurs années.

Ce prêt lui permettra de renforcer son capital et de mieux développer  ses activités.

Les profits lui permettront d’améliorer les conditions de vie de la famille (santé, nourriture, habillement etc.…) et d’augmenter ses épargnes.
texts.en:
This solidarity group was created on June 3, 2010. The group is made up of ten women who live in the same neighborhood. Their main activity is small-scale retail. 

Mrs. Fatou Bintou, the group's leader,  is on the right in the photo, with her hand raised. She is 32, married, and the mother of two children. She is also responsible for one of her nephews. Her business is selling soap. She has been doing this for several years and has plenty of experience.  This loan will allow her to increase her capital and strengthen her level of activity. With the profits, she will be able to improve her family's living conditions (health, food, clothing, etc.) and to increase her savings.

loans.use: to buy soap.

loans.name: Kawral Pont Group

texts.fr:
Le groupe de solidarité kawral pont a été créé le 31/05/2007.IL est composé de 14 femmes qui habitent le même quartier.Leur principale activité  est le commerce.

Madame Amy debout à l'extrême droite est responsable du groupement de solidarité;elle est mariée et mère de 03 enfants.Elle est vendeuse de sandwich,d'œufs et de jus de fruits.

Elle dispose d'une bonne expérience de l'activité  pour l'avoir exercer plusieurs années;elle se ravitaille au marché central tous les matins pour ensuite revendre dans son quartier.

Son prêt lui permettra d'acheter des fruits,de la viande pour les besoins de son commerce.

Son objectif est de générer des ressources additionnelles pour une meilleure prise en charge de ses enfants et améliorer ses conditions de vie.
texts.en:
The solidarity group Kawral was set up on May 31 2007. It is made up of 14 women who live in the same neighborhood. Their main activity is trading. 

Mrs. Amy, standing at the far right, is the group's leader. She is married and the mother of 3 children. She sells sandwiches, eggs and fruit juice. Amy has a very positive experience, having been involved in this activity for several years. She obtains her supplies at the central market every morning, then re-sells in her own neighborhood. 

The loan will allow her to buy fruit and meat for her business. Her goal is to create enough resources to be able to take better care of her children and improve her living conditions.

loans.use: to buy fruit.

loans.name: Oscar Juvenal

texts.es:
El socio pertenece al banco comunal “SEÑOR DE HUANCA”; el banco se encuentra ubicado en el Distrito de Calca en la Provincia de Urubamba y Departamento de Cusco.

El socio tiene 78 años de edad, el socio es casado, El socio tiene a todos sus hijos independientes, el socio es jubilado de la Policía Nacional del Perú, El socio es fundador de este banco comunal y es miembro activo desde hace 12 años, el socio requiere el préstamo para poder invertir en esta ocasión en la implementación de sus tienda de abarrotes que tiene su señora esposa, el socio ayuda en la atención de la misma y requiere poder comprar arroz, azúcar, fideos y todos los productos de primera necesidad que salen a diario al por mayor para de este modo tener mejores ganancias. El socio solicita el préstamo para invertir en la compra de productos de primera necesidad.

La socia agradece el apoyo que se le otorgara y así mismo se compromete a cumplir de manera disciplinada con los pagos de las cuotas.
texts.en:
The member belongs to the communal bank "Señor de Huanca" located in the district of Calca in the province of Urubamba and department of Cusco. 

The member is 78 years old and married. All of his children are independent. The member is retired from the Peruvian National Police. He is the founder of this communal bank and has been an active member for 12 years. 

The member requires the loan on this occasion to be able to invest in the operation of his wife's grocery store. The member helps with customer service at the store and needs to buy rice, sugar, beans and all the basic staples that are bought daily wholesale so as to better their earnings. The member requests the loan to invest in the purchase of basic staples for sale. 

The member appreciates the support given and thus promises to make the payments in a disciplined manner.

loans.use: to invest in basic staples for his store.

loans.name: Visitación

texts.es: Visitación D. 54 años D. edad, casada con julio D. 48 años con quien tiene 4 hijos. Ellos viven en su casa propia del centro poblado D. Canayre del distrito D. LLochegua. Visitación es una mujer D. mucho coraje, que desD. muy joven trabajó en el campo, hace 10 años atrás recién incursiono en el negocio D. venta D. cereales, que ella misma los adquiere en la serranía del Perú, es la única proveedora D. cereales en su localidad, es por esta razón que cuenta con buenos clientes potenciales. Visitación realiza sus actividades con la esperanza D. ver a sus hijos felices y ser unos profesionales. Este será su  segundo crédito con MFP, por lo tanto espera el apoyo D. cada uno ustedes para continuar con su trabajo. Por otro lado se compromete a ser puntual en el pago D. sus cuotas. Visitación es la persona, que a pesar D. su edad es la más alegre y dinámica en su banco comunal. Con los 1.500 que solicita, comprará más productos como cereales para aumentar sus ingresos.
texts.en:
Visitación is 54 years of age and married to Julio, 48, with whom she has four children. They live in their own home in the population center of Canayre of the district of Llochegua. Visitación is a woman of great pluck who has worked in the fields from a very early age. Ten years ago she started up a business selling grains which she herself purchases in the mountains of Peru. She is the only grain supplier in her area and for that reason she has an excellent potential customer base. Visitación carries out her business in hopes of seeing her children happy and that some of them would be professionals. 

This will be her second loan with MFP, and she hopes for the support of each of you in order to continue on with her work. For her part she promises to be punctual about making her payments. In spite of her age, Visitación is the most cheerful and dynamic person in her communal bank. With the 1,500 she requests, she will buy more products such as grains in order to increase her earnings.

loans.use: to purchase more grains.

loans.name: Angel Ernesto

texts.es:
Angel Ernesto tiene 26 años, es casado vive con la esposa y con los hijos, en  el Cantón Guaranda Provincia de Bolívar.

Los miembros de la V.R.C.  SAGRADO CORAZON  se encuentra ubicada en el sector Cuatro Esquinas perteneciente al cantón Guaranda a una distancia de 15 minutos de la oficina de la cooperativa, esta ventanilla integran 12 socios que se dedican a la agricultura, crianza de animales y a la comercialización de los mismos y otras actividades que da utilidades.

Angel se dedica a la agricultura siembra papas, trigo, maíz, además se dedica al negocio de quesos. Las compras las realiza en el mercado de Guaranda y las vende en el mercado mayorista de la misma ciudad.

Solicita el crédito para la comprar de insumos para los cultivos. Con el apoyo del crédito le ayudaría económicamente para suplir sus necesidades. Enfrenta desafíos como enfermedades en los cultivos. Su sueño es tener casa propia.

Le gusta hacer deporte y las fiestas de carnaval.
texts.en:
Angel Ernesto is 26, married and lives with his wife and children in the hamlet of Guaranda in the province of Bolívar. He has no children. 

The members are of the communal bank "Sagrado Corazón" [Sacred Heart] located in the Cuatro Esquinas area belonging to the Guaranda hamlet, fifteen minutes away from the cooperative's office. This group is made up of 12 members who raise crops and livestock as commercial enterprises along with other income-producing activities. Angel earns a living in agriculture growing potatoes, wheat and corn. He also has a cheese business. He does his purchasing in the Guaranda market and sells in the wholesale market of the same city. 

He is seeking the loan to purchase supplies for growing his crops. With the support of the loan he would be financially helped to supply his needs. He faces challenges such as diseases in his crops. His dream is to have his own home. He likes to play sports and the Carnaval festivities.

loans.use: to buy supplies for growing crops.

loans.name: Rubí

texts.es:
La señora Rubí es socia del banco comunal Mujeres solidarias del Distrito D. Calleria, Departamento D. Ucayali, tiene 50 años D. edad, está casada y tiene 4 hijos.
Son tres años que viene trabajando con los préstamos D. Manuela Ramos, se dedica a la costura y confección D. prndas, cuenta con un taller bien equipado con 4 máquinas, 2 son industriales.
Con su nuevo préstamo D.  S/. 2,200.00 nuevos soles comprará: 15 kilos D.  tela D. algodón, 12  hilos D.  remalle D. diferentes colores,  ½ litro D. aceite D. maquinas, 4 paños D. aguja, uno para cada máquina.
Su esposo es trabajador independiente y tiene que trabajar bastante para poder traer el dinero a su hogar, D. ahí partió la necesidad D. trabajar ambos para poder solventar los gastos familiares.
Sus hijos todavía son pequeños y necesitan la atención D. sus padres.
Rubí está contenta porque ahora si tiene las herramientas para poder trabajar y elaborar buenos productos.
texts.en:
Ms. Rubí is a member of the "Mujeres Solidarias" ("Women's Solidarity") communal bank in the district of Caleria, department of Ucayali. She is 50 years old, married, and has four children.

She has been working with loans from Manuela Ramos for three years. She works sewing and making garments. She has a well-equipped workshop with four sewing machines, two of which are industrial.

She will buy the following with her new loan of 2,200 nuevos soles: 15 kilograms of cotton fabric, 12 bobbins of thread in various colors, 1/2 a liter of machine oil, and four needle cloths (one for each machine)

Her husband is an independent worker and they have had to work a great deal to be able to bring enough money into their house. This is why they both need to work to meet their family's needs.

Her children are still small and need their parents' attention.

Rubí is happy because now if she has the tools she can work and create good products.

loans.use: to buy fabric, thread, and needles

loans.name: Charles

texts.en:
Charles sells rubber stamps, signs and prints to all types of customers in his community. He has been running this business for 3 years. Charles intends to use his loan to add more stock to his business. 

Charles hopes to be the leading rubber stamp company in the market. He wants to grow his company and be able to employ people. Charles describes himself as focused and visionary.

loans.use: add more rubber stamps and signs for his business

loans.name: Meshack

texts.en:
Meshack is married and has a 2-year-old daughter. He runs an educational center, teaching children who are as young as pre-school. Meshack has been running this business for 6 years and employs 8 people. Meshack intends to use his loan to furnish the classes. 

Meshack hopes to continue running a stable business educating children. In the future, he hopes to become a school director at a big school. Meshack describes himself as committed and honest.

loans.use: to furnish the classes in his educational center

loans.name: Anonymous Group
loans.use: to buy dishes, cups, plastic buckets, spoons, plates, etc. in large quantities to add to her business

loans.name: Segundo Simon

texts.es:
Segundo Simon tiene 50 años, es casado vive con la esposa y con los hijos, en  el Cantón Guaranda Provincia de Bolívar. 

Los miembros de la V.R.C.  SAGRADO CORAZON  se encuentra ubicada en el sector Cuatro Esquinas perteneciente al cantón Guaranda a una distancia de 15 minutos de la oficina de la cooperativa, esta ventanilla integran 12 socios que se dedican a la agricultura, crianza de animales y a la comercialización de los mismos y otras actividades que da utilidades.

Segundo se dedica a la agricultura siembra papas, trigo, maíz, además tiene 4 cabezas de ganado. Las compras las realiza en el mercado de Guaranda y las vende en el mercado mayorista de la misma ciudad.

Solicita el crédito para la comprar de insumos para los cultivos. Con el apoyo del crédito le ayudaría económicamente para suplir sus necesidades. Enfrenta desafíos como enfermedades en los cultivos. Su sueño es tener casa propia y aumentar sus ingresos.

Le gusta conversar con la familia.
texts.en:
Segundo Simon is 50 years old, married, and lives with his wife and children in the canton of Guaranda in Bolívar Province.  

The members of the Sacred Heart Communal Bank meet in the sector of Cuatro Esquinas, which is part of the canton of Guaranda and located 15 minutes from the office of Cooperativa San Jose. The Communal Bank consists of 12 members who engage in agriculture, livestock breeding, the sale of their products, and other profitable activities.

Segundo is a farmer who grows potatoes, wheat, and corn. He also has four heads of cattle.  Segundo purchases his supplies at the market in Guaranda and sells his products at the wholesale market in the same city. 

He is requesting a loan to buy supplies for his crops. With the financial assistance provided through this loan, he will be able to acquire needed supplies. The challenges he faces include diseases that could impact his crops.  His dreams including owning a home and increasing his earnings.  

Segundo enjoys talking with his family.

loans.use: to purchase farming supplies.

loans.name: Peter

texts.en:
Peter is married and has two children, ages 2 and 6. He owns a butchery, selling meat to all types of customers in his community. Peter has been running this business for 10 years and employs 1 person. He intends to use this loan to purchase more materials to expand his business. 

Peter hopes to open up more branches one day. He describes himself as honest and obedient.

loans.use: to purchase more materials to expand his butchery

loans.name: Ida

texts.es:
La señora Ida es socia del banco comunal Mujeres Solidarias del Distrito Calleria, Departamento De Ucayali, tiene 60 años de edad, está casada y tiene 4 hijos.
Son 33 ciclos que viene trabajando con los préstamos de Manuela Ramos, se dedica a la venta de productos de belleza por catálogo.  Generalmente todo es por pedidos, que luego entregara a los clientes al crédito y en otros casos al contado.
Con este préstamo de S/. 2,500.00 nuevos soles comprará una buena cantidad de productos como: 4 perfumes de mujer, 3 perfumes de hombres, 2 talcos, jabones líquidos, 3 coloretes,  2 cremas anti arrugas.
Para poder sacar pedidos, ella visita a sus clientas puerta por puerta, gracias a este negocio, Ida puede ayudar económicamente a su esposo.
"Gracias a Manuela Ramos por brindarme toda la ayuda necesaria para poder seguir trabajando".
texts.en:
Sra. Ida is a member of the Communal Bank “Mujeres Solidarias” (Supportive Women) which is in the District of Calleria, Department of Ucayali. She is 60 years old, married, and has four children.

Ida has participated in 33 loan cycles with Manuela Ramos. She sells beauty products through catalogs. All of her sales are generally made through orders. When she delivers her products, Ida extends credit to her customers but in some cases she accepts cash.

With this loan of 2500 PEN, she will buy a large quantity of products including four women’s perfumes, three men’s colognes, two talcum powders, liquid soaps, three blushes, and two anti-wrinkle creams. In order to generate orders, Ida visits her customers by going door-to-door. Thanks to this business, she is able to help her husband with the finances.

She would like to say, “Thank you to Manuela Ramos for providing all the help I need to continue working.”

loans.use: to purchase perfumes, colognes, talcum powders, liquid soaps, and anti-wrinkle creams.

loans.name: Rosa Lili

texts.es:
La señora Rosi es socia del banco comunal Mujeres Solidarias del Distrito Calleria, Departamento D. Ucayali, tiene 65 años D. edad, está casada y tiene 4 hijos.
Trabaja con el Movimiento Manuela Ramos desD. hace 12 años y se dedica a la venta D. prendas D. vestir D. segunda mano, mercadería que lo lleva a vender por los caseríos D. la zona.  También hace intercambios con animales D. corral cuando las personas no tienen dinero para poder pagar (a esto le llaman trueque).
Con su nuevo préstamo D. S/. 2,500.00 nuevos soles comprará: 20 camisas manga largas, 20 pantalones, 30 polos, 10 faldas, 25 blusas, 12 pantalones para niños, 18 polos para niños,  12 shores para niños, 10 vestidos para damas, 6 vestidos para niñas, 12 blusitas para niñas, 6 polos manga larga, 4 casacas.
En este tipo D. negocio debe tener variedades D. prendas para poder vender más, su esposo es maestro albañil pero es poco el trabajo que tiene, D. esa manera la señora Rosa ayuda a su esposo, aunque tenga que ausentarce D. su casa por varios días para poder colocar toda su mercadería.
Gracias a Manuela Ramos sigue trabajando y quiere hacerlo por mucho tiempo más.
texts.en:
Sra. Rosa is a member of the Communal Bank “Mujeres Solidarias” (Supportive Women) which is in the District of Calleria, Department of Ucayali. She is 65 years old, married, and has four children.

Rosa has worked with Manuela Ramos for 12 years and earns her living by selling secondhand clothes. She carries her merchandise with her so that she can sell in the villages throughout the area. She is also willing to exchange her goods for domesticated animals whenever her customers do not have the money to pay (otherwise known as bartering).

With this new loan of 2500 PEN, Rosa will buy 20 long-sleeve shirts, 20 pairs of trousers, 30 polo shirts, 10 skirts, 25 blouses, 12 pairs of children’s trousers, 18 children’s polo shirts, 12 children’s shorts, 10 women’s dresses, 6 girls’ dresses, 12 women’s blouses, 6 long-sleeve polo shirts, and 4 coats. In this type of business, she needs to offer a variety of clothes so that she can sell more. Her husband is a master bricklayer, but he has little work. In this manner, Sra. Rosa is able to help her husband even if it requires that she be away from home for several days so that she can sell all of her merchandise.

Thanks to Manuela Ramos, she is able to continue with her job because she wants to keep working for a long time.

loans.use: to purchase an assortment of secondhand clothing.

loans.name: Margelina Anaelva

texts.es:
Las señora Margelina es socia del banco comunal La Positiva del distrito De Calleria, Departamento de Ucayali, tiene 31 años de edad, está casada y tiene 1 hijo.
Lleva tres años perteneciendo al banco comunal, ella se dedica a la venta de abarrotes, tiene una tienda bien surtida instalada en su casa, la misma que hace poco implementó, solo tiene un hijo y tiene tiempo como para atenderlo sin ningún contratiempo.
Con éste nuevo préstamo de S/. 1,700.00 nuevo comprará: 4 cientos de platos descartables, 3 cientos de vasos descartables, 3 cientos de cucharas descartables, 2 cientos de tenedores descartables, 2 cientos de fuentes descartables, 2 cientos de copas descartables, 2 paquetes de servilletas.
Esta vez quizo agregar este nuevo producto (descartables) en su tienda para poder surtirlo un poco más.  Nos dice que en cada ciclo ira comprando más cosas para abastecerla más.
Solo espera que Manuela Ramos siga ayudando a las mujeres trabajadoras que quieran surgir y salir adelante.
texts.en:
Sra. Margelina is a member of the Communal Bank “Las Positiva” (The Positive) which is in the District of Calleria, Department of Ucayali. She is 31 years old, married, and has one child.

Margelina has been part of the Communal Bank for three years. She sells groceries and has a store established in her house. Over time she has been able to keep it in operation. Since she only has one child, she has the time to look after him without any problems.

With this new loan of 1700 PEN, Margelina will buy 400 disposable plates, 300 disposable glasses, 300 disposable spoons, 200 disposable forks, 200 disposable serving dishes, 200 disposable cups, and 2 packets of napkins. At this moment, she wants to add new disposable products to the inventory of her store so that she can be stocked with more products. She says that with each loan cycle, she is able to buy more products to add to her inventory.

Her only hope is for Manuela Ramos to continue helping working women who want to improve and succeed.

loans.use: to purchase an assortment of disposable products.

loans.name: Anonymous Group
loans.use: to buy more fish to add to her business

loans.name: Jose Guillermo

texts.es: José Guillermo, tiene la edad de 35 años, casado  y vive con sus 2 hijos y su esposa que son sus mayores prioridades. El pretende con el crédito realizar la compra de herramientas para la construcción. El trabaja como un constructor y realiza trabajos de casas, el lo que quiere es dar a sus trabajos un acabado mas bueno y de mejores calidades. El cuenta con algunas herramientas a su poder pero para ir perfeccionando sus trabajos debe comprar unas que no posee todavía. El quiere darle a las personas que lo contratan un mejor acabado para así poder tener más ingresos económicos  con la realización de mejores trabajos. El piensa en el futuro de su hijos y su esposa, el quiere brindarles una calidad de vida mejor y seguir adelante con planes propuestos por él y su señora esposa.  Es el primer  préstamo que  recibido de FUDECOSUR. El  no había tenido antes otros préstamos en bancos estatales, pero FUDECOSUR le ha brindado el préstamo con mayores facilidades y la tasa de intereses mucho más baja.
texts.en:
José Guillermo is 35 years old, married, and lives with his wife and two children who are his highest priorities. He intends to use this loan to buy construction tools. José is a home builder and wants his construction jobs to be completed well and be of good quality. He has some power tools, but in order to do a perfect job he needs to acquire the ones that he does not yet own. José wants to perform the best work for the people who hire him so that he can earn more income by completing better jobs. He thinks about the future of his wife and children and wants to provide them with a better quality of life. José also wants to move forward with the plans he has made for himself and his wife.

This is the first loan he has received from FUDECOSUR. José has not had any previous loans with the state banks. FUDECOSUR is providing this loan with better terms and a lower interest rate.

loans.use: to purchase tools for his construction jobs.

loans.name: Baowendpinda Group

texts.fr:
Mme Sanata est la responsable du groupe BAOWENDPINDA. Elle est marié et mère d’un enfant. Il a 12ans et va à l’école. Elle a une personne a sa charge.

Mme est tisseuse depuis 5ans et vend parallèlement des mangues à la période des mangues. Elle s’approvisionne au marché de kouritenga.Ses clients les hommes.

Elle veut s’acheter un Ball de fils de tisse.

Avec ses bénéfices, elle économise et aide son mari dans la popote. Elle ambitionne ouvrir une grande boutique de pagnes tissés et prendre soin de son enfant afin de lui offrir un meilleur avenir.
texts.en:
Ms. Sanata is the leader of the Baowendpinda group. She is married and the mother of 1 child, who is 12 and goes to school. She has one dependent.

Sanata has been a weaver for the past 5 years, she also sells mangoes when they are in season. She obtains her supplies at the Kouritenga market, and her customers are men. 

Ms. Sanata wants to buy a bale of thread for weaving. With her profits, she will save and help her husband in buying food. She plans to open a large shop of woven cloth and to take care of her child to give him a better future.

loans.use: to buy one bale of thread for weaving

loans.name: Deydania Olivia

texts.es:
Deydania es socia del  Banco Comunal “Santa Rosa de San José”, ubicado en el distrito de Mañazo,  provincia y departamento Puno, tiene 22 años de edad, es conviviente y tiene un hijo.  No pudo concluir sus estudios superiores.
 Viene  trabajando desde hace tres ciclos con el Movimiento Manuela Ramos, su primer préstamo fue de  S/. 500.00 nuevo soles, dinero que utilizó en su negocio de venta de flores y compra/venta de ganados ovinos y vacunos.
Ahora solicitará un nuevo préstamo por la suma de S/. 1200.00 nuevo soles, dinero que incrementará al capital de su negocio y comprará dos toros, dice que los comprará en Cabanillas, Sana Lucia y lo engorda en Caricari por cuatro meses para luego venderlo.  En el negocio le ayuda su tío, su esposo es policía y no tiene mucho tiempo para apoyarla.
Su sueño es tener más capital para el negocio y tener más ingresos económicos.
Lo que le gusta  del Banco Comunal son las charlas y la unión entre las socias.

En la foto se muestra junto a su pequeño hijo.
texts.en:
Deydania is a member of the Communal Bank “Santa Rosa de San José” which is located in the District of Mañazo, Province and Department of Puno. She is 22 years old, in a common-law marriage, and has one child. Deydania was not able to finish her college education.

She has worked with Manuela Ramos for three loan cycles. Her first loan was in the amount of 500 PEN. The money was invested in her businesses of selling flowers and trading sheep and cattle.

Now she is requesting a new loan in the amount of 1200 PEN. The money will increase her business capital so that she can buy two bulls. Deydania says that she will buy the animals in Cabanillas, Sana Lucia. She will bring the animals to Caricari to fatten for four months before selling them. Her uncle helps her with managing her business. Deydania’s husband is a police officer and does not have much time to help her. Her dream is to have more capital for her business so that she can generate more income. What she enjoys about the Communal Bank are the seminars and the unity among the members.

The photograph shows Deydania with her young son.

loans.use: to purchase two bulls.

loans.name: Maria Martha

texts.es:
Maria Martha tiene 30 años, es soltera vive con la madre y los hijos es madre soltera, en  el Cantón Guaranda Provincia de Bolívar. 

Los miembros de la V.R.C.  SAGRADO CORAZON  se encuentra ubicada en el sector Cuatro Esquinas perteneciente al cantón Guaranda a una distancia de 15 minutos de la oficina de la cooperativa, esta ventanilla integran 12 socios que se dedican a la agricultura, crianza de animales y a la comercialización de los mismos y otras actividades que da utilidades.

Maria se dedica a la agricultura siembra papas, trigo, maíz ademas tiene dos cabezas de ganado. Las compras las realiza en el mercado de Guaranda y las vende en el mercado mayorista de la misma ciudad.

Solicita el crédito para la comprar de insumos para los cultivos. Con el apoyo del crédito le ayudaría económicamente para suplir sus necesidades. Enfrenta desafíos como enfermedades en los cultivos. Su sueño es tener casa propia y terrenos para seguir sembrando.

Le gusta las fiestas de carnaval.
texts.en:
Maria Martha is 30 years old and a single mother.  She lives with her mother and her children in the canton of Guaranda in Bolívar Province. 

The members of the Sacred Heart Communal Bank meet in the sector of Cuatro Esquinas, which is part of the canton of Guaranda and located 15 minutes from the office of Cooperativa San Jose. The Communal Bank consists of 12 members who engage in agriculture, livestock breeding, the sale of their products, and other profitable activities.

Maria is a farmer who grows potatoes, wheat, and corn.  She also has two heads of cattle.   Maria purchases her supplies at the market in Guaranda and sells her products at the wholesale market in the same city.

She is requesting a loan to buy supplies for her crops.  With the financial assistance provided through this loan, she will be able to acquire needed supplies. The challenges she faces include diseases that could impact her crops.  Her dreams include having her own house and land so that she can continue planting.  

Maria enjoys the Carnival festivities.

loans.use: to purchase farming supplies.

loans.name: Mayosi Group

texts.en:
Memunatu is the leader of this group of entrepreneurs. Memunatu was born in Newtown, an outskirt of Freetown. She is 45 years of age. Memunatu is married to a carpenter and the couple has 3 children – 1 in primary school, 1 in secondary school and 1 adult. Memunatu sells charcoal and fire wood. She has been a businesswoman for 10 years now. 

With the help of this loan, Memunatu and her group members will be able to expand their businesses, make more sales and consequently improve on their living conditions. Memunatu will use her share of the loan (500,000 SLL) to buy a large quantity of charcoal and fire wood to sell.

loans.use: to buy a large quantity of charcoal and fire wood to sell

loans.name: Zenaida

texts.es: Zenaida de 31 años de edad, enviudo muy joven, pero tiene 2 hijos, pedro de 11 años, y jazmín de 2 añitos de edad, juntos viven en su propia casa ubicada en el centro poblado de Canayre del distrito de LLochegua. Zenaida, es una mujer trabajadora, desde muy pequeña aprendió a labrar la tierra. Cuando decidió formalizar su familia, emigraron a esta parte de la selva peruana exactamente al centro poblado de Canayre, que con el poco recurso que tenían adquirieron una parcela de cacao donde hoy cuenta con un parque recreacional, con piscina y juegos infantiles, generándoles un ingreso económico para el bienestar de su familia. Hace un año atrás perdió a su querido esposo a causa de una enfermedad y desde ese momento zenaida tuvo que hacerse cargo de todos los trabajos que tenía su esposo. Zenaida no se deja vencer, es  más esta animada en continuar el trabajo que su esposo realizaba y si es posible mejorar su parque recreacional. Este es su segundo crédito con MFP, por el que esta comprometida en realizar el pago de sus cuotas muy puntualmente. Zenaida es una mujer bien comprometida con los quehaceres de su banco comunal. Con los 3.000 nuevos soles,  invertirá en el remodelamiento de su campo recreacional campestre.
texts.en:
Zenaida is 31 years old and became a widow at a young age. She has two children, Pedro (age 11) and Jazmín (age 2). They live together in their own home in the central village of Canayre in the District of Llochegua. Zenaida is a hardworking woman who learned how to farm at a young age. When she decided to start her family, she moved to this part of the Peruvian jungle and settled in the central village of Canayre. She used the few resources she had to acquire a parcel of cacao farmland where she now operates a recreational park with a swimming pool and children’s games. Through this business, she is able to generate income for the welfare of her family. It has been a year since she lost her husband due to illness. At that moment, Zenaida had to take over all of her husband’s responsibilities. She does not give up and is excited about continuing the work of her husband. If possible, she would like to improve their recreational park.

This is her second loan with MFP. Zenaida promises to complete her payments on time. She is a woman who is committed to the tasks of her Communal Bank. With this loan of 3000 PEN, Zenaida will invest in the renovation of her recreational facility.

loans.use: to renovate her recreational facility.

loans.name: Eusebio Antonino

texts.es: El señor Eusebio tiene 60 años de edad es casado tiene hijos los cuales son mayores de e independientes, eusebio se dedica a, manejar su moto taxi, la cual es propia anteriormente eusebio trabajaba como obrero de campo, con el tiempo logro ahorrar y compro la moto taxi que ahora es su herramienta de trabajo, la esposa de eusebio se dedica a la preparación de postres que vende en las afueras de su casa, y con ello ayuda a su esposo en los ingresos familiares,eusebio esta solicitando el crédito para darle mantenimiento a su moto taxi, cambio de aceite algunas reparaciones al motor entre otros , eusebio tiene muchos sueños uno de ellos es comprar otra moto taxi para darla en alquiler y así le genere mas ingresos por mejorar su calidad de vida, eusebio esta muy agradecido con la confianza que se le esta brindando.
texts.en:
Sr. Eusebio is 60 years old, married, and has grown children who are independent. He drives a motorcycle taxi that he owns. Eusebio previously worked as a field laborer. Over time, he was able to save enough money to buy his motorcycle taxi which he uses for work. His wife prepares desserts and sells them outside of their home in order to generate income for the family.

Eusebio is requesting a loan to maintain his motorcycle taxi, change the oil, make a few engine repairs, and perform other needed services. He has many dreams. One of them is to buy another motorcycle taxi that he can rent out in order to generate more income. This will allow him to improve his quality of life. Eusebio is extremely grateful for the trust that has been demonstrated to him.

loans.use: to pay for vehicle maintenance, an oil change, engine repairs, and other services for his motorcycle taxi.

loans.name: Neomida Pelagia

texts.es:
Neomida es socia del  Banco Comunal “Santa Rosa de San José”, ubicado en el distrito de Mañazo,  provincia y departamento de Puno, tiene 45 años de edad, está casada y tiene 5 hijos (2 independientes). Tiene educación secundaria.
La señora es una socia reingresarte del Banco Comunal Santa Rosa de San José, del Movimiento Manuela Ramos, su préstamo anterior fue de S/. 500.00 nuevo soles, dinero que invirtió en su negocio venta de artículos artesanales.
Con este nuevo préstamo de S/.  500.00 nuevo soles invertirá en la compra de diez kilos de lanas de diferentes colores para su producción de  prendas como chalinas, chompas y chalecos.  Dice que trabaja con un grupo de personas  para exportar sus productos a Estados Unidos.  Su esposo trabaja en el magisterio.
Su sueño es seguir trabajando y mejorar sus ingresos para que sus hijos sean profesionales.
Lo que le gusta  del Banco Comunal es la facilidad del préstamo, la unión y la responsabilidad.
texts.en:
Neomida is a member of the Communal Bank “Santa Rosa de San José” which is located in the District of Mañazo, Province and Department of Puno. She is 45 years old, married, and has five children (two of whom are independent). Neomida has a high school education.

She rejoined the “Santa Rosa de San José” Communal Bank and Manuela Ramos. Her previous loan in the amount of 500 PEN was invested in her business of selling handcrafted items.

With this new loan of 500 PEN, Neomida will invest in the purchase of 10 kilos of wool in different colors for producing garments such as scarves, sweaters, and vests. She says that she works with a group of people that exports their products to the United States. Her husband works in the teaching profession.

Her dreams are to continue working and improve her income so that her children can become professionals. What she enjoys about the Communal Bank are the convenience of the loan, the unity, and the responsibility.

loans.use: to purchase 10 kilos of wool in different colors.

loans.name: Ephata Group

texts.es: Este grupo se llama "EPHATA", que significa la más pequeña, buscando una oportunidad de tener más ventas  y crecer. Están ubicadas en el Estado de México. El grupo está conformado por 10 integrantes y es la primera vez que solicitan un prestamo. Vilgahi es integrante del grupo. Ella tiene 48 años, estudió hasta el quinto año de primaria, es ama de casa y tiene 5 hijos, 2 mujeres y 3 hombres. Ella se dedica a la producción y venta de tlacoyos (que consiste en una tortilla gruesa ovalada y larga, preparada con masa de maíz y frijoles o habas cocidos, la cual puede ir rellena de diversos ingredientes como frijoles, habas, carne, requesón)  que inició hace 10 años. Solicita el préstamo para comprar la materia prima que es maíz, frijol, chicharon y gas. Sus clientes son personas del área conurbada, prefieren comprar los productos con ella por la calidad y buen servicio que ofrece y la atención amable de la señora. Al momento  de solicitar este préstamo se siente con mucha alegría de tener la oportunidad de invertir y distribuir su producto. Su negocio es importante ya que con ello puede salir adelante con los gastos de su familia y así tener una mejor calidad de vida, ella añora darles una carrera  profesional a su hija que esta estudiando preparatoria  para que tenga un mejor futuro.
texts.en: This group is called "Ephata," which means "the smallest one." They are all looking for an opportunity to make more sales and to grow. They are located in the state of Mexico. The group is comprised of 10 members and this is the first time they are requesting a loan. Vilgahi is one member of the group. She is 48 years old, studied until the fifth year of primary school, is a homemaker, and has five children (two girls and three boys). She makes and sells tlacoyos (which consist of a thick, long oval tortilla prepared from a dough of corn and cooked beans, which can then be filled with various ingredients like beans, lima beans, meat, and cottage cheese). She started doing this ten years ago. She is requesting a loan to buy ingredients and supplies like corn, beans, pork rinds, and gas. Her customers are people in her area who prefer to buy her products for their quality and the good service and friendly attention she provides. At the moment, Vilgahi feels very happy to have the opportunity to invest and to distribute her product. Her business is important because with it, she can get ahead on her family's expenses and therefore have a better quality of life. She longs to give her daughter, who is currently in high school, the opportunity to pursue a professional career so that she can have a better future.

loans.use: to buy ingredients and materials like corn, beans, pork rinds, and gas

loans.name: Prosperidad Group

texts.es: L. Señora Maura es socia D. L. Alcancía comunal “Prosperidad”, tiene 40 años D. edad, madre soltera con  3 hijos que estudian en colegio del estado. L. socia se dedica al comercio D. L. compra y venta D. ropas al por mayor y menor, se levanta a tempranas horas del día para poder realizar sus compras D. ropas para niños y adultos, a cantidades mayores con un precio mínimo para venderlos en su tienda a un precio razonable que le genere ganancias, L. socia invertirá su préstamo para comprar mas cantidades D. prendas D. vestir. ElL. tiene sus objetivos al futuro comprar su propia tienda comercial y abrir otros locales D. ventas. En L. foto está ubicada lado derecho D. L. primera fiL. sentada, con polo bordado color negro pantalon jean color azul.
texts.en: Maura is a member of the Prosperidad village bank. She is 40 years old and a single mother of three children who attend public school. She buys and sells clothing for children and adults at wholesale and retail. She gets up early in the morning in order to buy clothes in bulk at a low price, and then sells them in her store for a reasonable price that makes her a profit. Maura will invest her loan in purchasing more clothing. In the future she would like to buy her own store and open several other shops. In the photograph, she is to the right in the first row, seated, wearing a black embroidered top and blue jeans.

loans.use: to purchase clothing to sell.

loans.name: Guido Rovinson

texts.es:
Guido Rovinson tiene 26 años, es soltero vive con los padres, en  el Cantón Guaranda Provincia de Bolívar. No Tiene  hijos.

Los miembros de la V.R.C.  SAGRADO CORAZON  se encuentra ubicada en el sector Cuatro Esquinas perteneciente al cantón Guaranda a una distancia de 15 minutos de la oficina de la cooperativa, esta ventanilla integran 12 socios que se dedican a la agricultura, crianza de animales y a la comercialización de los mismos y otras actividades que da utilidades.

Guido se dedica a la agricultura siembra papas, trigo, maíz, en terrenos de los padres. Las compras las realiza en el mercado de Guaranda y las vende en el mercado mayorista de la misma ciudad.

Solicita el crédito para la comprar de insumos para los cultivos. Con el apoyo del crédito le ayudaría económicamente para suplir sus necesidades. Enfrenta desafíos como enfermedades en los cultivos. Su sueño es terminar los estudios.

Le gusta hacer deporte y las fiestas de carnaval.
texts.en:
Guido Rovinson is 26 years old and single. He lives with his parents in the town of Guaranda in Bolívar province. He doesn't have any children.

The members of the village bank Sagrado Corazón are in the Cuatro Esquinas neighborhood in Guaranda, about 15 minutes from the lending cooperative's office. The group has 12 members who work in farming, raising and selling livestock, and other activities.

Guido is a farmer. He grows potatoes, wheat, and corn on his parents' land. He makes his purchases at the local Guaranda market and then sells them in the city's wholesale market.

He is requesting a loan in order to buy supplies for his crops. The loan will help him finance his needs. He faces many challenges, such as crop blights. His dream is to finish his studies.

He likes sports and the festivals at Carnaval.

loans.use: to purchase supplies for his crops.

loans.name: The Star Group

texts.en:
Meet with members of the “The Star” group from Waterloo, a small town in western Sierra Leone. They are all local entrepreneurs who have come to SMT, a partner of Kiva, to apply for a loan of 500,000 SLL for each. With the help of this loan, they will be able to expand their businesses, make more sales and consequently improve on their living conditions. 

Hadiatu is the leader of this group. The 35-year-old is a widow with 2 children – 1 in primary school and 1 not of school-going age. Hadiatu has been a businesswoman for many years now. She sells slippers/flip-flops. With her share of this loan, she is going to buy dozens of slippers to add to her business.

loans.use: to buy dozens of slippers to add to her business

loans.name: Alejandrina

texts.es:
Alejandrina es socia del  Banco Comunal “Santa Rosa de San José”, ubicado en el distrito de Mañazo,  provincia y departamento Puno, tiene 46 años de edad, está casada y tiene 3 hijos.  Estudió hasta 1ro de educación primaria.
Su primer préstamo fue de S/. 500.00 nuevo soles, dinero que invirtió en su negocio de compra y venta de carne, coca y queso.  Trabaja  con el Movimiento Manuela Ramos desde hace tres ciclos.
Este nuevo préstamo de S/ 1000.00 nuevo soles, lo utilizará para aumentar al capital de su negocio y comprará tres corderos y veinte unidades de queso, la señora dice que trabaja sola ya que su esposo trabaja como operario en la mina.
Su sueño es seguir trabajando y mejorar el negocio.
Lo que le gusta  del Banco Comunal es la puntualidad y la unión entre las socias.
texts.en:
Alejandrina is a member of the Santa Rosa de San José village bank located in the Mañazo district in the department of Puno. She is 46 years old and married with three children.
Her first loan was for 500 soles, which she invested in her business buying and selling meat, coca leaves, and cheese. She's received three loans from the Movimiento Manuela Ramos.
She will use this latest loan, in the amount of 1000 soles, to increase her working capital and buy three lambs and 20 units of cheese. She says that she works alone, since her husband works in the mine.
Her dream is to keep working and improve her business.
Her favorite things about her village bank are its punctuality and the sense of solidarity among the members.

loans.use: to purchase three lambs and 20 units of cheese.

loans.name: Ana Jensy

texts.es: Ana Jensy, tiene la edad de 25 años, soltera  y vive sola actualmente. Ella pretende con el dinero realizar la compra de mercadería para su pulpería y tener un mayor surtido de productos. Ella cuenta con el local a su poder y quiere brindarles a sus compradores un mejor surtido de productos para aumentar la clientela y generar ganancias para su futuro. Ella quiere generar ganancias ahora que no tienen responsabilidades y poder guardar sus ganancias para en su futuro tener una estabilidad económica y un bienestar familiar estable. Es el primer  préstamo que  recibido de FUDECOSUR. El  no había tenido antes otros préstamos en bancos estatales, pero FUDECOSUR le ha brindado el préstamo con mayores facilidades y la tasa de intereses mucho más baja.
texts.en: Ana Jensy is 25 years old, single, and currently lives alone. She plans to use the loan money to purchase merchandise for her pulpería [small grocery store] and to have a greater variety of products. She has the space at her disposal and would like to offer her customers a greater selection of products in order to increase her clientele and create income for her future. Ana would like to generate income now, when she does not have any responsibilities, so that she can save her earnings to have more economic stability and well-being for her family in the future. This is the first loan she has received through FUDECOSUR. She has not had previous loans through state banks, but FUDECOSUR has offered her this loan with better terms and a much lower interest rate.

loans.use: to buy stock for her small grocery store

loans.name: Henry

texts.en:
Henry is married and has two children, ages 1 and 4. He runs a small medical clinic helping women, men, and children in his community. Henry has been running this business for 3 years. He intends to use this loan to purchase more medical supplies to expand his business. 

Henry hopes to be able to open a large hospital one day. He describes himself as honest and diligent.

loans.use: to purchase more medical supplies to expand his business

loans.name: Kelvin

texts.en:
Kelvin owns a steelworks company in Nairobi and employs 3 people. Together they manufacture gates, doors, windows, beds, and chairs. He has been running this business for 3 years and hopes to keep expanding. Kelvin intends to use this loan to by more materials so he can boost his business.

Kelvin dreams of opening more branches and becoming the CEO of a large company.  Kelvin describes himself as respectful and honest.

loans.use: to buy more materials so he can boost his steelworks business.

loans.name: Felipa

texts.es:
Felipa es socia del  Banco Comunal “Santa Rosa de San José”, ubicado en el distrito de Mañazo,  provincia Puno y departamento Puno, tiene 33 años de edad, es conviviente y tiene 7 hijos estudiando.  Estudió hasta 3ro de secundaria.
Viene trabajando  con el Movimiento Manuela Ramos desde hace tres ciclos, su préstamo anterior fue por la suma de  S/ 500.00 nuevo soles, dinero que invirtió en su negocio de compra y venta de ovinos.
Con éste nuevo préstamo de S/ 800.00 nuevo soles, comprará cinco ovinos para engordarlo en un mes y carnearlo para venderlos en la ciudad de Puno y a veces los vende en la rinconada.  En el negocio la ayudan sus hijos mayores.  Su esposo trabaja.
Su sueño es tener una casa  en Juliaca y tener un carro para el trabajo, esto le facilitará el traslado de los animales que compra.
Lo que le gusta  del Banco Comunal son los ahorros, la capacitación y la orientación que les brindan las Promotoras.
texts.en:
Felipa is a member of the communal bank "Santa Rosa de San Jose", located in the district of Manazo in the province of Puno and the department of Puno. She is 33 years old, married common-law, and she has 7 children, all of whom are in school. She has a grade 9 education. 

She has been with the Manuela Ramos movement (Kiva Field Partner) for the past three loan cycles. Her previous loan was in the amount of S/ 500 nuevos soles and the funds were invested in her business, which is the buying and selling of sheep.

This new loan is in the amount of S/ 800 nuevos soles and she will purchase five sheep to fatten and slaughter within the month. She sells in the city of Puno and at times she sells in La Rinconada. Her eldest children help her in the business. Her husband works. 

Her dream is to have a house in Juliaca and to have a work to use for her business. It will help her to transport the livestock which she purchases.

What she enjoys about her communal bank is the savings, the training, and the orientation that the promoters offer.

loans.use: to purchase five sheep.

loans.name: Elisa

texts.es: Elisa de 54 años de edad, casado con víctor de 56 años con quien tiene un hijo llamado Anel de 15 años de edad. Juntos viven en la comunidad de puerto mayo del distrito de Pichari. Aunque Elisa creció en una localidad rodeada de quincha y barro,  eso no significó que seguiría por el mismo camino, es así que hace 10 años ella empezó con la venta de golosinas en las afueras de un colegio que encuentra en su misma localidad. En estos últimos años ella abrió una tienda de abarrotes donde expende productos de primera necesidad, por lo que su esposo la apoya en la atención hacía los clientes. Ella se siente satisfecha con su trabajo, ya que le genera ganancias y con eso contribuye a cubrir los gastos de su hogar. En el futuro espera construir su casa de material noble, con la finalidad de mejorar la calidad de vida de su familia. Este será su segundo crédito con MFP por tanto espera el apoyo de cada uno de ustedes para poder establecerse en su negocio y en su economía. Con los 3.000 nuevos soles, desea adquirir más productos de primera necesidad para implementar su tienda.
texts.en: Elisa is 54 years old and she is married to Victor, 56 years old. They have a child named Anel and he is 15 years old. They live together in the community of Puerto Mayo in the district of Pichari. Although Elisa grew up surrounded by thatch and clay it did not mean that she would follow in down the same road. Therefore 10 years ago she started selling sweets outside a school located in her own community. In the past few years she opened a grocery store where she carries essential goods. Her husband helps her in attending the clients. She feels satisfied with her work especially because it generates and income and with it she is able to contribute towards the household expenses. In the future she hopes to build a house of sturdy materials with the goal of improving the quality of life for her family. This will be her second loan with MFP (Kiva Field Partner). She hopes to have the support of each one of you to help her establish her business and her finances. With the 3000 nuevos soles she wants to purchase more essential goods to supply her store.

loans.use: to purchase essential goods to supply her store.

loans.name: James

texts.en:
James is 40 years old and married.  He has 4 children, aged 4 to 14.  He runs a fiberglass service shop providing resin, hardener, mat, accelerator, erosil (filler), lime, sandpapers, and air cleaners. Most of his customers are technicians working in the area. James has been running this business for 7 years and employs 1 person. He intends to use this loan to buy more materials in large quantities. 

James hopes to be the largest distributor or materials to technicians. He describes himself as honest, hardworking, and humble.

loans.use: to buy more raw materials in large quantities for his business.

loans.name: Cirila

texts.es:
La socia pertenece al banco comunal “SUMAC  AYLLU”; el banco se encuentra ubicado en el Distrito de Huanchac en la Provincia de Cusco y Departamento de Cusco.

La socia es la Sra. Cirila; la socia tiene 41 años de edad, la socia es casada, La socia tiene 4 hijos de 20, 17, 15, 7 años de edad; La socia se dedica al comercio minorista, la socia se dedica a la compra y venta de banderas, ella elabora en tela y de acorde a las fechas cívicas diferentes trabajos para la venta al público en general y durante todo el año y en especial para estas fechas que se vienen en el mes de julio, la elaboración de banderas de la nación y las banderas locales y escudos, solaperas y otros, La socia requiere el crédito para la compra de materiales para la elaboración de banderas.

La socia agradece el apoyo que se le otorgara y así mismo se compromete a cumplir de manera disciplinada con los pagos de las cuotas.
texts.en:
This member belongs to the “SUMAC  AYLLU” community bank. The bank is located in the district of Huanchac in the province and department of Cuzco.

The member's name is Cirila. She is 41 years old and married. She has 4 children, aged 20, 17, 15, and 7 years old. She is a retailer who buys and sells flags. She makes them from fabric and sells them to the general public on different civic holidays and all year long, especially during July. She makes the national flag and local flags and coats of arms, lavaliers and more. She needs the loan to buy materials to make the flags.  

She is grateful for the support given to her and she is committed to making her payments in a disciplined manner.

loans.use: to buy materials to make flags.

loans.name: Siglo X X Group

texts.es: La Señora Olinda es socia de la Alcancía comunal “Siglo XX”, tiene 58 años de edad, casada con Pedro tiene 7 hijos de los cuales solo el último hijo  está en su poder. Ella se dedica a la venta de comida ambulatorio a la altura del Colegió del Estado “Corazón de Jesús”. Todos los días saca su triciclo que sirve como transporte y así atender a sus comensales, también  vende bebidas como gaseosa y otros. El préstamo solicito para poder implementar en la infraestructura de su casa y comprar mesas, sillas, cubiertos y así poder abrir su restaurante en su casa. La socia está ubicada en la izquierda de la foto chompa color rojo mandil color azul. La señora sentada de chompa color verde con lentes es una invitada para el próximo desembolso.
texts.en:
Sra. Olinda is a member of the Communal Bank “Siglo XX” (20th Century). She is 58 years old, married to Pedro, and has seven children. Only her youngest child is still under her care. Olinda sells food as a street vendor in front of the “Corazón de Jesús” (Heart of Jesus) State School. Every day she brings her tricycle that she uses for transportation and starts tending to her customers. She also serves beverages, such as sodas and other refreshments.

The loan she is requesting will be used to repurpose the infrastructure of her house as well as buy tables, chairs, and cutlery so that she can open a restaurant in her home. In the photograph, Olinda is the woman on the left wearing a red sweater and blue smock. The woman who is seated and wearing a green coat and eyeglasses was invited to participate in the next loan disbursement.

loans.use: to purchase tables, chairs, and cutlery.

loans.name: Forward Ever Group

texts.en:
