Athanasie is 50 years old and is married with five children between the ages of 15 and 25. She sells milk, juice, bread and so on in her supermarket. Athanasie's business is well-organized and she works from 7am until 10pm every day. She has 20 years of experience.
Athanasie has requested a loan from Kiva lenders in order to increase her business by buying more foodstuffs, such as soft drinks, to sell. With her profits, Athanasie will save to pay for her children's school fees and reinvest in her business.

loans.use: to increase her business by buying more bread, juice and milk.

loans.name: Julio Roberto

texts.es: Julio Roberto de 54 años de edad, habita en su casa con su hija que ya es mayor de edad y se dedica al comercio. Julio es un hombre emprendedor, durante mucho tiempo ha trabaja para sacar adelante a su hija y poder gozar de una mejor calidad de vida. Él se dedica a los negocios, hace 29 años que logro establecer un pequeño negocio en el mercado central del lugar donde él habita, dicho negocio se encuentra en una zona muy concurrida por los habitantes del lugar  y en especial el negocio de Julio el cual ofrece variedad de productos como: pastas de zapatos, cremas para el cabello, pega, cepillos, etc. Muchas personas lo prefieren ya que se encuentra en una zona muy accesible y además es un hombre  muy amable que se gana a sus clientes con su carisma. Solicita este crédito a INTEGRAL para invertir en su negocio y poder comprar variedad de productos para ofrecer a sus clientes y así poder atraer  a nuevos demandantes de sus productos que le permitan aumentar  su nivel de ingreso.  Con el crédito comprará más artículos necesarios y demandados por los clientes como: Hilos, agujas, cremas para el cabello, pega, pasta, encendedores, y muchos otros productos que los clientes solicitan con frecuencia. De esta manera espera mejorar su calidad de vida.
texts.en: Julio Roberto is 54 years old. He lives in the home of his grown daughter, and he works in retail trade. Julio is an enterprising man, and he has worked for many years to help his daughter get ahead and to enjoy a better quality of life. He is a businessman, and 29 years ago he was able to establish a small business in the central market of the town where he lives. This business is located in an area that is very well-traveled by the local inhabitants. They especially visit Julio's business, which offers a variety of products such as shoe polish, hair creams, glue, brushes, etc. Many people prefer his business because it is in a highly accessible place, and in addition, Julio is a very likable man who wins over customers with his charisma. He is requesting this loan from INTEGRAL to invest in his business by purchasing a variety of products to offer to his customers, so that he can attract new buyers and thus increase his income. With the loan, he will buy more items that are needed and sought after by his customers, such as thread, needles, hair creams, glue, paste, and lighters, along with many other products that his customers often request. In this way, he hopes to improve his quality of life.

loans.use: to buy thread, needles, hair creams, glue, paste, lighters, etc.

loans.name: Jean Pierre

texts.en:
Jean Pierre is 31 years old and married. He has owned a motorcycle transport business for the past 11 years. His business is well organized and open daily from 7 a.m. until 7 p.m.
 
Jean Pierre has requested a loan from Kiva lenders via Vision Finance Company in order to buy essential materials like tires and engine for his motorcycle. With his profits, he plans to reinvest in his business and to save for his future.

loans.use: To buy essential materials like tires and engine.

loans.name: Rosa

texts.es: Rosa de 45 años de edad, reside con su hija Reyna de 24 años en su casa. Rosa es muy trabajadora y responsable. Ha trabajado toda su vida para sacar adelante a su querida hija que ya es mayor de edad, quien ahora también ayuda con el negocio. Rosa se dedica a la venta de verduras frescas en la zona donde habita. Es una mujer ejemplar ya que a pesar de su edad no se da por vencida, a tempranas horas de la mañana se levanta para tener lista las verduras que sus clientes demandan con frecuencia. Su sueño es contar con mayor variedad de verduras frescas para ofrecer a sus clientes y tener suficientes a la hora que le demanden. Para esto necesita este crédito que solicita a INTEGRAL para poder comprar mayores cantidades de las diferentes verduras como: tomates, papas, zanahorias, chiles, güisquiles, limones, etc. Que le permitan mejorar sus ventas así como su nivel de ingresos, con el objetivo de mejorar su calidad de vida.
texts.en: Rosa is 45 years old and lives in a house with her daughter Reyna, age 24. Rosa is very hard-working and responsible. She has worked all her life to help her beloved daughter get ahead. Her daughter is now an adult and also helps her with the business. Rosa works selling fresh vegetables in the area where she lives. She is an exemplary woman, since in spite of her age, she is not slowing down. She gets up early in the morning to get the vegetables ready that her customers most often request. Her dream is to have a greater variety of fresh vegetables to offer to her customers, and to have a large enough supply available when her buyers want them. Because of this, she needs the loan she is requesting from INTEGRAL to buy larger quantities of various vegetables such as tomatoes, potatoes, carrots, chilies, chayotes, limes, etc. This will allow her to improve her sales and raise her income level, with the aim of improving her quality of life.

loans.use: to buy tomatoes, potatoes, carrots, chilies, chayotes, limes, etc.

loans.name: Yovana

texts.es: La Señorita Yovana es soltera sin hijos, vive en casa de sus padres, tiene su puesto propio en el mercado La Cuchilla con licencia de funcionamiento y pago de impuestos a la alcaldía, cuenta con una antigüedad de cuatro años en la venta de cosméticos para hombres y mujeres y en menor proporción artículos de limpieza para el hogar.   Vive en la zona La Cuchilla desde su nacimiento prácticamente hasta la actualidad, la Señorita Yovana forma parte de los tantos jóvenes de emprendimiento que a su corta edad es una microempresaria exitosa y conocida con un negocio grande, legalmente constituido a su nombre, buena antigüedad, con una buena y estratégica ubicación por lo tanto tiene un buen flujo de clientes lo que se traduce en un buen nivel de ventas, con el dinero del crédito comprara mercadería al por mayor en artículos de limpieza como en cosméticos, esta agradecida con la institución por el apoyo brindado.
texts.en:
Señorita Yovana is a single woman without children. She lives at home with her parents and has her own stall in the La Cuchilla market. She has an operating license and pays taxes to the city. She has four years of experience selling cosmetics for men and women and a smaller amount of household cleaning supplies. 

She has lived in the La Cuchilla region from the time she was born practically until the present. Señorita Yovana is one of the many enterprising young people. At a young age, she is a successful and well-known micro entrepreneur. She has a large, long-standing business, legally established in her name. The store is in a good and strategic location providing a good flow of customers, which translates into a good level of sales. 

With the money from this loan she will buy wholesale cleaning supplies and cosmetic merchandise. She is grateful to the institution for the support provided.

loans.use: to buy wholesale merchandise.

loans.name: Bertha

texts.en:
Bertha’s inspiration for getting into the apartment business was her children and the knowledge that she was not meant to work for someone else her whole life. She chose to become a landlord because she felt that she could own this business, work full-time until it took a foothold, and still devote time to her three children. 

Bertha realized she wanted to own rental property while sitting on the porch of her rented apartment in Houston, Texas. As she looked at the ugly façade of her complex, she began to visualize the numerous ways in which the building could be improved. After a short time, she says, she had a crystal clear idea of how to turn the run-down complex into a beautiful, flourishing community.

With this dream as her motivation, Bertha decided to take a courageous leap. With only her experience as a renter as her guide, she called her landlord to discuss purchasing the complex. Six months later, Bertha was the owner of Bertha’s Homes and landlord of a newly purchased community of apartments. The first thing she attended to, she says, were the immediate, smaller repairs needed on the five units in her complex. Now, she is beginning to hire companies to repair the larger, structural issues with the building such as the weak foundations and old windows.

Raising a family, learning the ins and outs of a new business, and working a full-time job hasn’t been easy. Bertha has had to grapple with a system of building permits and city officials, which, at one point, threatened to condemn her buildings and bankrupt her business. She says that her biggest business success to date was convincing the city that she would make the needed repairs to bring the buildings up to code. 

With this loan, Bertha will pay for the repairs to the major structural problems with her building. Without it, she says, she would have lost her business because, though she had enough saved for the minor repairs, she could not afford to pay the companies she hired to do the larger, most necessary ones.

Though she says that every cent from her day job as a cook at a restaurant turns into a new investment in her business, Bertha remains satisfied and happy with her decision to become a landlord. She advises others to not get discouraged and to keep on trying until you have reached your goals. Getting started is the most difficult part, she says, and “if a door doesn’t open, it is because it’s not the one that will lead you to success. That’s the way I look at it.”

loans.use: to pay for major structural repairs to her 5-unit apartment building.

loans.name: Anonymous Group
loans.use: to purchase a sewing machine.

location.country: The Democratic Republic of the Congo

loans.name: Blanca

texts.es: La Sra. Blanca vende comida: desayuno y almuerzo en el mercado Los Pozos desde hace mas de 10 años, es una persona muy conocida en el sector de comidas y dan buenas referencias.  La Sra. Blanca tiene 3 hijos ya independientes solo una hija de 16 años es la única dependiente, viven mas de tres años en la zona de la Pampa de la Isla, su marido es taxista desde hace mas de 2 años.   La Sra. Blanca tiene un puesto que está en anticrético en Los Pozos que es donde vende su comida y alquila otro puesto que ocupa para guardar todas sus sillas, mesas hornos, garrafas, pero cuando hay meses de mayores ventas los ocupa ambos, ya que tiene cuatro personas trabajando para ella, una maestra cocinera, dos ayudantas de cocina y una mesera, puesto que atiende aproximadamente 20 mesas, su venta de comida es grande, es antigua, tiene muchos clientela y el mercado Los Pozos es un centro de consumo masivo, con un buen flujo de ingresos, el dinero del crédito lo utilizara en la compra de material de construcción para la refacción de un baño en su casa, es un apersona muy trabajadora agradecida con la institución por el apoyo brindado.
texts.en: Blanca has been selling prepared breakfast and lunch foods in the Los Pozos market for more than 10 years. She is a very well known person in the food sector and she has good references. Blanca has 3 grown children and only her 16-year old daughter is still dependent. They have lived in the region of La Pampa de la Isla for more than three years. Her husband has been a taxi driver for more than 2 years. Blanca leases a stand in Los Pozos from where she sells her foods. She also rents another area where she keeps all her chairs, tables, ovens, and carafes. But some months when her sales are high she uses both spaces. She has four people working for her, a master chef, two assistant cooks, and a waitress who attends approximately 20 tables. Her food sales are significant and her business is established and she has many clients. The Los Pozos market is a center of massive consumption with a good influx of cash. The funds for this loan will be used to purchase construction materials to repair a bathroom in her house. She is a very hardworking person and she is thankful with the institution for the support given her.

loans.use: to purchase construction materials to repair the bathroom in her home.

loans.name: Elsi Lorena

texts.es: Elsi Lorena de 28 años de edad, reside en su casa con compañero de vida quien trabaja como motorista y sus dos pequeñas hijas de 7 y 12 años de edad. Para Elsi sus hijas lo son todo y es por ellas que trabaja duramente para sacarlas adelante y darles mejores oportunidades a las que ella ha tenido. Elsi posee una tienda en su hogar de residencia, en la que últimamente a incluido la venta de artículos para el cuidado personal y ropa, y de hecho le ha ido bastante bien con ello, dado que además atiende con mucha amabilidad y dedicación, esto ha generado que muchas personas la prefieran y cada vez los clientes sean más. Su pequeño negocio es su principal fuente de ingreso y esto es lo que la hace luchar para mantenerlo activo y poder sacar adelante a su familia gracias a los beneficios que genera. Elsi sueña con tener una tienda grande y surtida en la cual los clientes puedan encontrar todo lo que necesitan. Para esto necesita hacer una reinversión en el área en donde ella a notado que mejor le está yendo que es con la venta de ropa y cosméticos. Para comprar éstos artículos solicita crédito a Integral y poder cumplir su sueño de ver su negocio florecer y poder dar a su familia una mejor calidad de vida.
texts.en:
Elsi Lorena is 28 years old. She lives in her house with her life partner who works as a driver and her two small daughters who are 7 and 12 years of age. To Elsi, her daughters are everything and she works hard so that they can get ahead in life and to give them more opportunities than she has had. 

Elsi has a store in her home where she has recently included the sale of personal care products and clothing. In fact, this has gone very well for her given that, in addition, she attends to her customers with great friendliness and dedication. This has resulted in a preference for her and her clientele is growing. This small business is her principal source of income, which is why she fights to keep it operational, to be able to allow her family to get ahead thanks to the benefits this business generates. 

Elsi’s dream is to have a large and well stocked store where her customers can find everything they need. To do this she needs to reinvest in the area where she has noticed things going well, the clothing and cosmetics sales.  She is requesting a loan from Integral to buy these products, see her business flourish and give her family a better quality of life.

loans.use: to buy clothing and cosmetics.

loans.name: Oscar Luis

texts.es: El Joven Oscar se dedica a arbitrar partidos de futbol atiende a campeonatos está asociado a liga de árbitros, se dedica a esta actividad hace 4 años el señor colabora a su familia con esta actividad por que sus padres son separados y vive con su Mama que se dedica a labores de casa,  el financiamiento que se le otorgó es para  la compra de una motocicleta que va a ser una herramienta de trabajo para su actividad por que indica que por factores de transporte  a veces  no puede llegar a sus partidos y la motocicleta va a ser de gran ayuda para movilizarse, vive en casa familiar, es un joven muy trabajador con ganas de superación agradecido con la institución por el apoyo brindado.
texts.en:
Oscar works as a soccer referee; he is a member of the referee league and attends championship games.  He’s been in this occupation for four years and he contributes to his family through this job because his parents are separated and he lives with his mother who is a domestic employee.

The loan he was granted is to buy a motorcycle that’s going to be a work tool for him because he indicates that sometimes, due to lack of transportation, he’s unable to get to the games.  The motorcycle will be of great use to him in order to get around.  

He lives in the family home and is a very hard working young man with a strong desire to get ahead.  He is grateful to the institution for the support provided.

loans.use: to buy a motorcycle.

loans.name: C4714 Intwari Group

texts.en:
Marianne is 36 years old and married. She has three children between 5 and 11 years old. She is the president of a group called “Intwari.”  She is the first person in her group. 

Marianne sells various goods such as rice, sugar, bread and biscuits. Marianne employs two persons for help her and has been working for two years.

Marianne and her group have requested a loan from Kiva lenders in order to purchase more goods such as beans, cassava, maize, rice, sugar, bread, etc., to sell.

With the profits from the loan, Marianne and her team would like to satisfy the basic needs of their families, reinvest in their businesses and start saving.

loans.use: To purchase more items to sell.

loans.name: Rosalía

texts.es: Rosalía  D. 53 años D. edad. Habita en su casa con sus dos hijas y dos nietos que se encuentran estudiando. Como toda mujer trabajadora y luchadora Rosalía ha logrado a través D. muchos esfuerzos establecer una tiendita en su lugar D. residencia. Ella trabaja D. lleno en su tienda para poder atender a sus clientes cuando necesiten D. sus productos los cuales son: golosinas, pan dulce, azúcar, macarrones, desechables, aceite, etc. DepenD. mucho D. su negocio y tiene muchas aspiraciones con las ventas que realiza. Por lo que ha decidido solicitar este crédito para invertirlo en su tienda y poder comprar mayor variedad D. productos como: detergentes, maíz, arroz, leche, bebidas, desechables, etc. y D. esta manera poder innovar su negocio ya que es una mujer emprendedora sabe que debe estar al día con las demandas del mercado para así poder seguir manteniéndolo vivo. Con esto espera poder obtener los recursos necesarios para vivir en mejores condiciones junto con su familia.
texts.en:
Rosalía, 53, lives in her house with her two daughters and two grandchildren who are in school.  Like all hard working, tenacious women, Rosalía has managed through much effort to set up a small store in her residence.  She works all out in her store to tend to customers when they need products like: snacks, sweet bread, sugar, macaroons, disposable items, oil, etc.  She depends quite a bit on her business and she has much hope placed on her sales.   

Because of this she’s decided to request a loan to invest in the store and to be able to buy a larger variety of products like: detergents, corn, rice, milk, beverages, disposables, etc. to renovate the business since she’s an enterprising woman and realizes that she has to be up to date if she wants to continue to keep her business alive.  She hopes with this to obtain the necessary resources to live in better conditions with her family.

loans.use: to buy detergent, corn, rice, milk, beverages, disposables, etc.

loans.name: Eulogio

texts.es: El señor  Eulogio es un cliente antiguo  desde el año 2007 que estuvo en el grupo solidario Leo, ahora el señor Eulogio  solicita  un crédito y es  sus primera secuencia de crédito individual que invertirá para la compra de angulares y planchas para realizar su trabajo, don Eulogio tiene un taller de tornería  el es muy dedicado a su trabajo, responsable también con sus pagos  a la institución emprender.  Eulogio vive en la zona Pampahasi, el esta muy contento de que se le haya elegido su crédito como Kiva agradecido con l institución por el apoyo que se le brinda.
texts.en: Eulogio is a longstanding client.  Since the year 2007 he was in the “Leo” communal bank but now Eulogio is asking for a loan and this is his first sequence as an individual borrower.  He will use it to buy angular metal rods and metal sheets to do his work.  Eulogio has a metal shop where he does work with a lathe.  He is very dedicated to his work and very responsible with his payments to Emprender.  Eulogio lives in the Pampahasi zone.  He is very happy to be chosen for a Kiva loan and grateful to the institution for the support provided.

loans.use: to buy angular metal strips and sheets of metal.

loans.name: Isabel

texts.es: Isabel D. 54 años D. edad, vive con su esposo D. 59 años  e hijo D. 21 años en su casa D. residencia. Isabel se dedica a la venta D. mariscos en el Mercado Central D. la zona donD. habita. Durante mucho tiempo ha trabajado duramente  para sacar adelante a su familia y darles una mejor calidad D. vida. DesD. muy tempranas horas D. la mañana empieza su día  para adquirir los mejores mariscos y tenerlos listos para sus clientes. Gracias a que es una mujer luchadora, emprendedora y sobre todo muy amable ha logrado ganarse la confianza D. sus clientes ya que siempre cuenta con los mejores precios y su producto es fresco y garantizado. Ha tomado la decisión D. solicitar este crédito a INTEGRAL con  la fe puesta en Dios que podrá abastecer su negocio con mayor variedad D. mariscos y logrará obtener mayores niveles D. ganancias. Con el crédito piensa comprar: pescado, camarones, tilapias, camaroncillo, y todo tipo D. marisco que los clientes solicitan con más frecuencia.  No pierD. las esperanzas que D. esta manera su vida y la D. su familia se verá mejorada.
texts.en:
Isabel, 54, lives with her 59-year-old husband and 21-year-old son in her residence.  Isabel sells seafood at the Central Market in the area where she lives.  She worked hard for a very long time to move her family forward and proviD. them with a better quality of life.  She starts her day very early in the morning to get the best seafood and have it ready for her customers.  Thanks to her being tenacious, enterprising and, above all, very kind she’s managed to win over the trust of her customers since she always has the best prices and her products are fresh and guaranteed.

She has decided to ask INTEGRAL for this loan trusting God that she’ll be able to stock her business with a greater variety of seafood and will attain larger profit levels.  She will use the loan to buy fish, prawns, tilapia, shrimp and all kinds of seafood that her customers request most often.  She does not lose hope that through this her and her family’s lives will see improvement.

loans.use: to buy fish, prawns, tilapia, shrimp, etc.

loans.name: Evangelina

texts.es: Evangelina D. 53 años D. edad, vive con tres hijas en una pequeña casita que logró adquirir gracias a muchos esfuerzos.  Evangelina es una mujer luchadora que con su trabajo ha sacado adelante a sus hijas las cuales se encuentran trabajando ya que no lograron sacar sus estudios debido a la situación económica. Esta mujer sueña con ver a su familia en mejores condiciones  y piD. a Dios que le D. la fuerzas necesarias para poder seguir ayudándolas en lo que pueda. Una gran mujer, valiente y emprendedora, se dedica  a la venta D. verduras en la zona donD. resiD., tiene un puesto en el que ofrece todo tipo D. verduras como: zanahorias, papas, repollos, chile verD., entre otros. Sus productos son muy demandados ya que siempre trata la manera D. mantener productos frescos y sobre todo atender a sus clientes D. la mejor manera. Es por esta razón que solicita a INTEGRAL este crédito para poder abastecer su pequeño negocio D. variedad D. verduras como: zanahorias, papas, yuca, güisquiles, chiles, tomates, etc.  y así poder ofrecer mayor variedad D. verduras y lograr obtener mayores ventas que le permitan sostenerse económicamente y seguir ayudando a su familia.
texts.en:
Evangelina, 53, lives with three daughters in a little house that she acquired thanks to much effort.  Evangelina is a tenacious woman who has managed to raise her daughters who are working because economic conditions maD. it impossible for them to stay in school.  

This woman dreams with seeing her family in better conditions and asks God to give her the necessary strength to continue helping them in any way possible.  A great, brave, enterprising woman, she sells vegetables near where she lives.  She has a stand where she offers all kinds of vegetables like: carrots, potatoes, cabbage and green chilies, among others.  Her products are in high demand because she always tries to keep them fresh and, above all, treat her customers the best way possible.

Because of this she is asking INTEGRAL for this loan to be able to stock her small business with a variety of vegetables like: carrots, potatoes, manioc, chayote, chilies, tomatoes, etc. to offer a wider variety of vegetables and obtain more sales that will make it possible for her to support herself and continue helping her family.

loans.use: to buy carrots, potatoes, manioc, chayote, chilies, tomatoes, etc.

loans.name: Lourdes

texts.es: La Sra. Lourdes  tiene como actividad la venta D. Vidrios; dobles, espejos y catedrales,  en la Zona Villa el Carmen la Ciudad D. La Paz, esta actividad que realiza es la fuente principal D. ingresos para ella  y su familia, tiene dos hijos que están en Colegio D. la misma zona, el esposo es Cerrajero en marcos D. aluminio para puertas D. vidrio, el trabajo lo realizan juntos durante  diez años  trabajando D. esta manera, es una persona muy dinámica y emprendedora , en esta oportunidad solicita crédito para incremento D. capital comprando variedad D. vidrios D. esta manera busca lograr y  mejorar sus ingresos para el bienestar D. su familia. Ojo en la foto se encuentra en compañía D. su esposo.
texts.en:
Lourdes sells glass; double paned, frosted and mirrored, in La Paz’s Villa del Carmen zone.  This activity is the main source of income for her and her family.  She has two children who go to school in the same area.  Her husband’s a metal worker specializing in aluminum frames for glass doors.  They have been working together for ten years.  She is a very dynamic, enterprising person.

On this occasion she asked for a loan to increase capital buying an assortment of glass.  She hopes to improve her family’s wellbeing this way.

Please note: she appears in the photo accompanied by her husband.

loans.use: to buy double paned, frosted and mirrored glass.

loans.name: Maria

texts.en:
Maria is a married women with three children.  She lives in the city of Hato Mayor. This is a rural area where agricultural activities are common. 

She is dedicated to raising pigs. She takes care of them from the time the mother is pregnant until they are ready to be sold. She sells the pigs after they are grown, some for meat and other to reproduce. She has been running this business for four years. 

Maria has taken out two loans with field partner Esperanza International over the past year, both of which have been paid back in full. She has used these loans to expand her business.

Her most difficult challenge is to be sure that her children live a Christian life, according with Jesus' will. She really enjoys working and taking care of her family. She thanks all of you for supporting her dream to change her life and give her family a better kind of living.

loans.use: to buy pig food.
